Author: DeViL303
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade Is Celebrating Its 2nd Birthday! https://medium.com/@ModulTrade/modultrade-is-celebrating-its-2nd-birthday-e921a090b508    Two years is quite a long time in the life of a startup. That might be especially true in the case of blockchain projects where the survival rate is pretty low — about 92% of them don’t go beyond a 1-year span. In spite of statistics, ModulTrade is alive and well, also featuring a very user-friendly e-wallet, a smart-contract based marketplace and a free knowledge-sharing platform for e-commerce over the blockchain. Also, ModulTrade has been chosen as “Top Payment Solutions Provider to Watch in 2019” by The Technology Era magazine.

Body: Hi guys. I'm wondering what's your opinion on the goods purchased in currencies other than euros or dollars, say crypto. I'm aware it's being used as a regular currency in various fields now. There are, for instance, lots of successfully run marketplaces based on crypto out there.  Over the past year, the market capitalization within crypto soared to the Moon.  Unfortunately, it's been a bear trend for a while now and no one can say for sure when it's gone. However, I am still thinking there's some light at the end of the tunnel - new market, pretty few competitors, great potential. So it's high time to become an active user.  So that begs the questions: Your thoughts on crypto as a payment method? Any progress achived in the upcoming year?

Body: Fall of Ethereum and How to Better Use Your Cryptocurrency with ModulTrade  What is happening in the crypto world? How to save your assets? MT Market is the best for that issue!  ModulTrade is one of the first Blockchain based trade platforms developed to support micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) by trading with freedom around the world. Using Blockchain technology, trade can now be executed through smartphones, tablets or desktop, with smart-contracts ensuring trusted transactions between both buyer and seller.  ModulTrade aims to promote growth and help traders find reliable counterparties from all over the world.  ModulTrade’s digital marketplace is part of the ModulTrade Value Ecosystem, which simplifies the international trade process and brings together all the different components. https://medium.com/@ModulTrade/fall-of-ethereum-and-how-to-better-use-your-cryptocurrency-with-modultrade-1eed56ca761d

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: How to increase the price of your MTRc investment — Global Sale in MTRc is coming!    If you are an MTRc holder, your token value may get depreciated by 90% from a nominal value in case you buy MTRc closer to the end of ModulTrade Token Distribution while some earlier investors during Pre-Sale are still at par.  You might be thinking — how long will it take to recover MTRc price and to grow the demand on the token? And how could you contribute to MTRc price increase?  First of all, one should accept the fact that there’s no reason preventing MTRc from the growth. But it’s undeniably that MTRc being a utility token is very much dependent on and driven by trade volumes on MT Market that uses MTRc to settle transaction and make fee payments. Therefore, we should think of the boost of Global Sale in MTRc and increase demand for MTRc on the exchanges.  ModulTrade has developed an action plan that contains practical steps to facilitate the above and reach the objectives. The worldwide release of the enhanced MT Market and the start of a Global Sale in MTRc are designed in order to increase the demand for MTRc and create necessary liquidity on the market. The Global Sale campaign is scheduled for the next week!  During the campaign anyone can buy cool items from Apple product range — Apple Watch, IPad, Iphone; products from Sony — VR, PlayStation and etc. at a real discount of up 50%  To buy cool stuff with crazy discounts at MT Market Buyers have to top up MTRc balances and get ready their wallets for the Global Sale.  How users can buy MTRc ? - Anyone can buy MTRc at Livecoin exchange and then buy Apple products — Watches, IPads, Iphones; Sony products — VR, PlayStation and others on MT Market for MTRc with big discount You may invite friends and kith who can buy MTRc from you at your price (co-called peer-to-peer) and get a nice discount at MT Market for products You can share a reference to buy MTRc using Credit Card at Livecoin And it can be your good self who can buy MTRc at current undervalued price at Livecoin and get up to 50% discount at MT Market.  You can also buy MTRc at LAToken and IDEX  ModulTrade budgeted fix amounts to subsidize each of the discount periods during Global MTRc Sale. Discounts start from 50% and then will be decreased to 30%. The first buyers will get a better price. Be ready to participate in Global MTRc Sale and get a real discount.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Dear community, we've got great news for you this great sunny weekend!  ModulTrade creates a foundation for the launch of ModulTrade blockchain based platform in African region.  LONDON, June 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- ModulTrade creates a foundation for the launch of ModulTrade blockchain based smart-contract platform (MT WALLET and MT MARKET) in the African continent after signing agreements with leading financial & logistic organizations and meeting with an Ambassador of the Russian Federation, Vladimir Baikov.  Leading logistics company SIMAT, and SERFIN, one of the key players in financial services and a representative of Western Union in Côte d'Ivoire and Burkina Faso, will both benefit from using ModulTrade products; ModulTrade Market and the ModulTrade Wallet, working on the ModulTrade blockchain currency, MTRc.  Having already signed deals in China with successful adoption and use of ModulTrade applications, the move into Africa marks a pivotal change in a market where there are more smartphone users than those with bank accounts. One of the key benefits ModulTrade provides is taking the full trade cycle online. Trade can now be executed through smartphones, tablets or desktop, with smart-contracts ensuring trusted transactions between both buyer and seller.  SIMAT will benefit from the ModulTrade Market's capability of cross-market trading, and the delivery of goods around the world. This partnership will open the doors for MSMEs who have before struggled to export and import through traditional trade flows.  The partnership with SERFIN will see ModulTrade's Wallet added to 800 outlets as a choice for money transfer and payment, and the ModulTrade Market a secure trade platform for SEFIN's clients – the MSMEs.  The partnerships have been welcomed by Russian Ambassador Vladimir Baikov, who agrees with the need for a new platform like ModulTrade to allow easier and safer cross-border trade and transactions for the African market.  Further to SERFIN and SIMAT, discussions are in place with other businesses, of which partnerships will be announced in due course. Current partnerships will commence with a pilot from July.  For further information about ModulTrade, visit https://modultrade.com  MEDIA ENQUIRIES  For further information please contact Vyacheslav Novikov, Chief Marketing Officer Email: vnovikov@modultrade.com  ABOUT MODULTRADE  The ModulTrade team aims to foster the next commercial revolution in trade finance, with the ModulTrade Marketplace and ModulTrade Wallet launched in early 2018. ModulTrade runs off a smart-contract Blockchain based eco-system, bringing together a comprehensive range of services for the full B2B trade cycle. Operating globally, the platform allows for cross-border trade for emerging markets and micro, small and medium enterprises. The product is accessible online and through smartphones, allowing complex trades to run in real-time, increasing efficiencies and lowering businesses overall costs. The ModulTrade Wallet allows the use of MTRc to make secure transactions across the Blockchain eco-system and release of funds via the smart-contracts.  Related Links  MT Market  MT Wallet https://finance.yahoo.com/news/modultrade-opens-global-market-african-034500167.html?guccounter=1

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: 🚀🚀🚀🚀  ModulTrade becomes a Trusted Shops certification program member!     We’re glad to announce that we became a member of Trusted Shops certification program which is Europe’s most popular e-commerce trustmark that makes trustworthiness visible at first sight. Certified shops are in line with comprehensive quality criteria, offer their customers financial risk protection with money-back guarantee and handle personal data with care.  Online shops are checked for compliance with the Trusted Shops quality criteria before they are awarded the trustmark that they can then display on their website. Our quality criteria involve strict requirements as to the service quality as well as legal requirements.  The security resulting from the trustmark, authentic customer reviews, and the money-back guarantee offered by the European leading trust brand is indeed very much appreciated by customers across the globe.  Trusted Shops (brand) combines 25,000 member shops across 27 EU countries and has over 10m consumer members.  We will appreciate your reviews and feedback on our profile page.  We also remind that our MTRc sale is still on air! You can buy real goods with significant discounts at https://market.modultrade.com MTRc can be bought on Livecoin, IDEX and LAToken.  MT Team  Democratizing Global Trade with Blockchain technology.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Great, great news!!!!   ModulTrade goes to Africa!    ModulTrade is going to monetize African trade potential with the help of Blockchain technology.  ModulTrade CEO (Evgeny Kaplin) and Co-Founder (Jean Chaanine) will visit Africa during June, 10–17th to present ModulTrade products (MT Market and MT Wallet) and sign several Partners Agreements to test ModulTrade platform.  Why ModulTrade goes to Africa?  ModulTrade goal is to connect every person with a smartphone in Africa to financial and trade services.  Africa is a huge market market for digital and blockchain solution. There are more people with smartphones than with bank accounts. ModulTrade products — MT Market and MT Wallet provide all in one solution for payments and trade through a smartphone.  How visit to Africa will develop ModulTrade ecosystem?  During the visit ModulTrade will meet and present its platform to top representatives of Government organisations, financial institutions, local producers and exporters. Preliminary agreements were reached to test the platform. It will be confirmed by a number of Memorandums signed during the visit.  The test and further market launch of ModulTrade platform in the region will boost the number of users and transactions followed by increase of demand for MTRc.  Stay with us and check the news and meeting status! Every evening we will share some.  Have a nice weekend,  MT Team

Body: ModulTrade in Africa, day 1    During visit to Africa our team (CEO (Evgeny Kaplin) and Co-Founder (Jean Chaanine) has several important meetings with key representatives from different industries. We will share the main highlights and agreements on MT Market & Wallet future development on this continent on daily basis. https://medium.com/@ModulTrade/modultrade-in-africa-day-1-aef4ddefb030

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade in Africa, day 1   Welcome to the MT news from Africa!  During our visit to Africa MT team (CEO (Evgeny Kaplin) and Co-Founder (Jean Chaanine) has several important meetings with key representatives from different industries. We will share the main highlights and agreements on MT Market & Wallet future development on this continent on daily basis.  Africa is a huge market for digital and blockchain solutions. There are more people with smartphones than with bank accounts. ModulTrade products — MT Market and MT Wallet provide all in one solution for payments and trade through a smartphone.  Our first stop is the largest economy in French-speaking West Africa and the third largest in West Africa — Côte d’Ivoire. Africa welcomed us with nice weather and hardworking atmosphere. We held two (and we still have two more — we will share the details later) important meetings here today, where we presented our idea and main products.  First, we presented MT Wallet and MT Market to Mr. Madi OUEDRAODO, CEO of SERFIN and his team (representative of Western Union in Côte d’Ivoire and Burkina Faso).    Online banking is taking over traditional banking all over the world. Opening branches for banks can cost a fortune and can also prove to be ineffective. This fact was first realized by the banks themselves. It motivates them to provide online banking and payments services to their customers via digital channels and social media.  We agreed on adding ModulTrade in their brands to deliver their clients (800 local counters in Cote d’Ivoire and Burkina Faso) and make MT Wallet a tool of choice for money transfer and payment; MT Market will become a SERFIN partner tool for trade for their clients (Micro businesses and SMEs).  We will then engage in connecting ModulTrade and SERFIN networks of clients to open their financial services (e.g. prepaid cards) and to collaborate on both platforms with each other.  After that, we headed to Mr. Stephane Eholie, CEO of SIMAT, a logistics company. They were interested in our capabilities of carrying out worldwide deliveries in terms of MT Market.    There are more than 70,000 small producers in Africa and more than 18 Bn €+ of export and import flows through the continent. ModulTrade aims to penetrate this market and generate over 100 mln € profit.  We agreed to test ModulTrade ecosystem (MT Market & MT Wallet) with SIMAT clients in summer 2018 with further commercial launch before the end of the year 2018.  Why do all the organizations need MT Wallet and MT Market?  All in one solution for digital payments and trade services based on the technology of the future — Blockchain  Adds Trust to the Trade — Letter of Credit and Escrow secured by blockchain  No SWIFT required for cross-border payments  Connects every Businessman with a Smartphone to financial services and trade  No Intermediaries (like Rotterdam) to Buy or Sell African goods globally — You can sell to final buyers and have secured payments   Tuesday will be a challenging day, yet full of opportunities.  Stay in touch to check tomorrow’s highlights,  MT team.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade in Africa, day 2 Greetings from the MT team all the way from Africa!   It is our second day here in the beautiful country of Côte d’Ivoire, West Africa. The day indeed proved itself to be full of opportunities — every meeting shows the huge potential of ModulTrade products in all industries. After having met with different industries’ representatives yesterday, we further met with four more organizations today to share our ModulTrade’s solutions.  The first meeting was held with Mr Guy Mbengue, CEO of Association for Promotion of Export, and his team. The export of agricultural and mineral products enabled the country to maintain a positive trade balance over a period of 15 years. It has thus become crucial for the country’s trade industry to have an efficient and modern payment system. With its blockchain-based payments system, MT hopes to provide just that. We presented our products to them and discussed possible use cases.    The next meeting was held with Mr. Hermann TRAORE, COO of West Africa’s Regional Stock Exchange — BRVM. With their central site located in the country’s urban center Abidjan, this stock exchange is common to all 8 of the West African countries. It is the world’s only exchange to connect a large number of countries over an entirely electronic and integrated sharing system. We talked about further improving BRVM’s network with MT’s idea of smart-contracts, MTRc and other unique blockchain solutions.  Modultrade is expected to participate in the digital transformation of BRVM and bring value for members for money transfers with MT Wallet.  There’s a big opportunity for MT Wallet in Africa, where there are more than 0.3 bn€ generated from mobile payments, resulting in more than 60 bn€ of cross-border payments in UEMOA made through mobile applications. MT-Wallet has a real chance of penetrating this market and becoming a trusted payment service.    The third meeting of the day was with the CEO of Association of Banking Professionals and Financial Institutions (APBEF-CI) — Mr. Serge KOUAMELAN — and their legal and operations teams. The organization works to bring together a large network of banks and financial institutions in Côte d’Ivoire. It aims to promote the development of banking related activities in the region via profitable relations between its members. The meeting focused on enhancing the association’s operations by making use of our platform’s modern payments method that uses blockchain tokens — MTRc. Moreover, our blockchain-based system offers faster and cheaper solutions to their network for banking services like transactions and funds transfers.     Our fourth meeting was with Mr. Aka Mathias NGOAN, CEO of National Organization for Agriculture Producers in Côte d’Ivoire (ANOPACI). The organization brings together various Ivorian agricultural sectors and has currently 30 member associations. Our meeting was focused on improving the organization’s operations by integrating our proposed MT technologies. Their main aims include defending the rights of producers and improving living conditions of farmers. We hope to speed up the company’s progress and help them effectively reach their goals.     Looking forward to our third productive day here!  Stay with us to get more updates about the upcoming meetings and their results!  MT team

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade in Africa, Day 3  Welcome to update from the third day of ModulTrade visit to Africa!   After a productive Tuesday with 8 meetings being held with the representatives of region’s leading industries Wednesday became a historical point for ModulTrade in Africa! The base for a consortium which will arrange the launch of ModulTrade platform (MT WALLET] and MT MARKET) in Africa was created!    We signed Agreements with leading logistics company SIMAT and main player in financial services in Côte d’Ivoire, SERFIN (representative of Western Union in Côte d’Ivoire and Burkina Faso).    Other agreements with Association of agricultural producers and export associations will follow soon.  These will create a foundation for the launch of ModulTrade platform in African region.  In July — August the pilot transaction will be realized on the platform  Local African producer will export agricultural products to the new market directly with the help of MT Wallet wallet.modultrade.com and MT Market market.modultrade.com  Keep checking for more MT news from our trip to Africa,  Best,    MT Team

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Trade globally and efficiently with improved MT Market!    We are glad to introduce the beta version of MT Market — Blockchain based Marketplace where every small business & individual can easily start to trade globally, efficiently and securely. Now You can buy & sell goods using MTRc & ETH.  Please go and check it here — market.modultrade.com and we will very much appreciate your feedback.  We want to remind you that any deal made on the platform is regulated by the smart-contract which controls the money transfer from the Buyer to the Seller based on the delivery status of the parcel. Hence, this makes each deal the safe deal.    What’s new here:  ModulTrade unified style — we’ve made a completely brand-new design of the main pages that is in line with our main corporate style (it is linked with the design of MT Wallet)  Cross currencies pricing — new product blocks contain prices in 3 currencies simultaneously and they are linked to current exchange rates  Personalized dashboard — for managing your offers and orders (for now it is in beta version)  Improved item search with our own search engine which will help our users to find the goods even easier  All in all, the most recent changes are connected with new design implementation (both UX/UI) and bug fixing that will make interaction of users with MT Market a lot easier. Thus, will support raising the trade volumes on the platform as simply as “Easy trading = Happy trading”!    What will be presented in the next release:  Various delivery options: we are partnering with several large multinational delivery companies that will handle your shipments. Also our smart contracts will support tracking from almost 500 international courier companies.  Reputation system: every seller will have a measurable reputation score based on his trades and the reviews left by buyers and some other cool and valuable stuff like information KYC-passing and verification. Therefore it will enhance buyer’s confidence in sellers presented on the platform. We do care about our clients and their security.  Online promotion of your goods: do you want your goods catch the eye and to be sold faster? We may have an arrangement for promoting your products on our platform and making better visibility on payable basis. All fees are quoted and payable in MTRc.    User-friendly dashboard: manage your products & deals more easier!   And we will not dwell on this for long and moving ahead to further developments!  Here are some of the additional features that we will develop in long term strategy:  Internal messenger — it will allow users to chat within the marketplace.  Automatic translation to other languages  — you can talk to sellers from all over the world without knowing their language, we will assist you!  Payment with any cryptocurrency* — buy with any cryptocurrency and receive payment in your desirable crypto.  Reputation system for buyers  — not only sellers are being scored!  System of measuring price level  — understand the competitive environment!   Here are some great picks that you can buy on MT Market immediately:  designer handcrafted goods like belts, wallets, backpack and satchel bags made of genuine signature leather and some available in different colours  crypto equipment that may perfectly supplement the needs of any nerd dealing with crypto currencies or enthusiast trying to make all good of his multiple investments in different coins. So come hell or high water, hardwallet will help you to keep your coins in safe store.  various electronic items and gadgets that are born to make colourful life easier and inspiring. Making purchase on MT Market will help you to cut the corners and to have fat of the land.   What’s next?  We are launching the Client engagement program next week, where you will get rewards for helpful feedback! We want to improve our MT  Market simultaneously with our users!  Step in global trade today https://market.modultrade.com !  Here is the detailed instruction “How to trade on MT Market”  You can always ask any questions in our Telegram Group https://t.me/MT_WalletSupport   Cheers and enjoy trading, MT Team

Author: tamquoc
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: I don't think there is anything to be done at this point (besides using development funds to pump the price via buyback and/or marketing towards token speculators). Newer ICOs might learn from the mistakes of those in 2017 and early 2018, though most probably will not. Personally I both invested in the ICO and bought a lot more after the price plummeted. Coin distribution in the middle of the biggest crypto downturn was rather unlucky too. All they can give us now is just apologies or acting in a way that might turn off potential business partners and at the expense of development funds (hypemarketing towards crypto speculators or manipulating the price of their own token through buybacks).

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: MT Market is near!  Dear community , Friday is a good day to share lots of good news. Mostly we will talk about MT Market — how will it look like, it’s awesome features, traded goods & future updates. But let’s move one after another. We plan to release beta of new improved MT Market till May, 30, and implement all the features till mid June. We are finalizing agreements with several suppliers, who will put lot’s of goods on the platform.    MT Market is the best place to trade in crypto globally. You can buy & sell goods for the best price using MTRc & ETH.    These are some cool features that will be available in the main version on mid June:  Safe deals: every deal is accompanied with a smart contract, which controls money transfer from buyer to seller. No need of middleman!  Various delivery options: we are partnering with several large multinational delivery companies that will handle your deliveries. Also our smart contract will support tracking from almost 500 international courier companies.  Exclusive reputation system: every seller will have measurable reputation score based on his trades and the reviews left by buyers and some other cool and valuable stuff like information KYC-passing and verification. So every buyer will be even more confident in their sellers. We do care about our clients and their security.  Online promotion of your goods: do you want to sell your items faster and make them more visible? You may pay several MTRcs for promoting your goods and making them much more visible.     User-friendly dashboard: manage your products & deals more easier!  We also have more long-term plans on implementing even more valuable features in MT Market later! Sit down and buckle up. These are some of them:  Internal messenger — it will allow users chatting within the marketplace.  Automatic translation to other languages — you can talk to sellers from all over the world without knowing their language, we will assist you!  Payment with any cryptocurrency* — buy with any cryptocurrency and receive payment in desirable crypto.  Reputation system for buyers — not only seller are being scored!  System of measuring price level — understand the competitive environment!  * which is supported by MT Wallet   We will first introduce 6 main goods categories and then will add others with arrival of other suppliers:  1. Crypto — miners, hardwallets, crypto hardware 2. Luxury — bags, shoes, watches, jewerly, pens, clothes, accessories 3. Handcraft — belts, cardholders, wallets, bags, organizers, messenger bag, purse (all leather goods) 4. Electronics — all types of electronics goods for private use 5. eGoods — giftcards & certificates, accounts 6. Services — insurance policies, booking, air-tickets, logistics, mining and cloud storage  And the last but not the least important point — MTRc turnaround.  How can you use tokens on the platform?  buy goods on MT Platform  promote your goods and stores on the platform  get special discounts & promotions   The next cool thing we are going to announce is MT Academy! We will reveal some information about it a bit later.  We would like to remind you, that there is an open vote for the top 3 ERC token to be added in the MT Wallet, do not forget to participate in it!  https://t.me/QuanBot?start=poll_653717_866354   Stay tuned & have a nice weekend,   ModulTrade Team

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Participate in rewarded MT Wallet testing & improvement    Dear ModulTrade supporters,  Last week we released the improved MT Wallet, one of the most efficient instrument for dealing with crypto. We hope you will enjoy the MT Wallet and its functionality.  In this release we focused on the these cool features:  cost-effective payments — MTRc transfer is free  smart UX/UI — maximum convenience in usage  high safety standards   We will proceed to work on the wallet to make it more useful and comfortable for you. Thus, we would like you, our community, to help us make it even better.  You are kindly asked to make three easy steps: Register on the wallet.modultrade.com  Try our wallet (send or receive tokens wherever)  Spend 5 minutes on proceeding through the short questionnaire https://ru.surveymonkey.com/r/DPT8JRS  The most valuable answers will be rewarded:  The top 10 reviews will get 300 MTRc each (voted by the team)  The first 30 qualitative reviews will get 100 MTRc  Important note — we count only qualitative reviews! We do not accept answers like “everything is cool” “or when exchange”.  We appreciate you help for making us better for you!  Small reminder — you can trade MTRc on IDEX, LATOKEN and Livecoin  Regards,  Your ModulTrade Team

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Dear Supporters,   We are glad to announce our listing on LAtoken exchange! We want our contributors to have several opportunities for convenient and effective trading, including different exchanges. MTRc is already traded on LAtoken – you can check the volumes and current price on https://wallet.latoken.com/market/Crypto/LA/MTRc-LA   LATOKEN Platform offers a number of unique benefits for ICOs. It has a database of ICO investors, issues a certificate confirming an ICO listing and offers a potential to secure additional investment from LATOKEN by token swap. ICOs listed on LATOKEN platform can also benefit from exposure and promotion at the Blockchain Economic Forum (BEF), a major global blockchain event that LATOKEN organizes on a regular basis.   Meanwhile ModulTrade team is working on MTRc listing at other well know and reputable exchanges.   We also want to give you some news regarding our product development – next week we will release the MT Wallet, that will allow p2p crypto transactions (BTC, ETH & MTRc) and other useful features!    Cheers, ModulTrade Team

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade celebrates its first anniversary!  Long, long time ago… Wait, that is from another story.  A year ago, on April 19, 2017, a group of 4 MIT graduates decided to officially launch a Revolution in Global Trade with the help of Blockchain technology. Thus ModulTrade Ltd was incorporated in UK, London.  On the way to main ModulTrade goal — to help over 400 million small enterprises to become equal players in global trade our team had an amazing year:  We launched first version of MT Platform;  Arranged successful Token Distribution;  Launched a new generation of crypto wallets — MT Wallet, you can use it here wallet.modultrade.com;  Made a trip around the world, sharing our ideas and vision — Europe, Russia, Singapore, China, Dubai, Switzerland…  And signed a number of agreements with our clients in China…  We have spent nights and tons of coffee creating the ModulTrade Ecosystem including MT Market, MT Wallet and MT Verticals look better and improving its functionality.  And we always had drive and fun while enjoying the great feeling of changing the world and helping millions of people!  All these were possible because of our secret resource — our MT Team, that was increased from 4 MIT alumni to more than 30 people worldwide.  We do have ambitious plans for nearest future:  Launch in Africa MT wallet and MT Market to open banking and trade for every businessman who has a smartphone  Establish the presence in Singapore to cover Asian region  Launch MT Trade & Reputational Network  Sign partnership agreements with leading institutions  And other interesting goals, that you can check here https://medium.com/@ModulTrade/modultrade-roadmap-update-848a850e8a4e  We will officially release our MT Wallet soon and give you some good news regarding MTRc listing!  Thank you for staying with us and let’s celebrate together!  Always with you,  Grown up ModulTrade Team

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade Releases The Next Generation Wallet For 1-Year Anniversary    April 19th, 2018, London, UK — ModulTrade Ltd. celebrates its 1-year birthday and gives a present to its users — the launch of their breakthrough MT Wallet, the new generation crypto wallet, that allows users to store, transfer and exchange crypto currencies. The MT Wallet makes blockchain payments easy, cheap and secure for everyone — you can check its awesome features https://wallet.modultrade.com  Welcome page of MT Wallet    There is no doubt this is a great achievement which brings users’ functionality of the ModulTrade platform to the next level. The wallet makes buying and selling goods on the platform much easier: it takes care of all payments on the platform, makes the payment process simple for every user, without charging transaction fees on the ModulTrade side.  In addition, some cool features like token exchange and buying for fiat will be added soon.  Why did we decide to make another crypto wallet? On the way of building ModulTrade blockchain based marketplace for small businesses, the ModulTrade team understood that we have to provide an easy and secure gateway for SMEs to allow them to enter into the crypto environment.  Transactions in MTRc are free in ModulTrade wallet. To give our users an incentive to start using the wallet, we decided to remove all commissions related to MTRc transactions when using the ModulTrade wallet. Global Trade Finance was never so easy and cost-effective.  Main page of MT Wallet    We have been working hard together with our UX designers to make it as intuitive as possible. It is a new leap in way of operating with crypto — the MT Wallet will help professional crypto enthusiasts and every crypto newcomer in his day-to-day operations with BTC, ETH and of course MTRc.  Following our baseline and regarding best practices — we spent a lot of time and resources to make MT Wallet safe and secure. As a target, we plan to be compliant with PSI DSS standards and pass the subsequent audit in the near future.  The MT Wallet is based on “three whales”: cost-effective, easy to use and safe.  After operating for one year in the crypto space, we have to admit it was a great journey. We have seen bull and bear markets, ups and downs, but managed to survive. It was a pleasure working with such a supportive community!  Birthday is always good time to announce something special — you can now trade MTRc on Livecoin.net!   — — —    ModulTrade CEO, Evgeny Kaplin, with 17-years experience in Trade Finance Business, started the revolution in Global Trade with the help of Blockchain technology aiming to provide secure and efficient trade services without intermediaries.  Evgeny admitted:  With the new MT Wallet our team is one step closer to the ultimate goal of ModulTrade — give every small business in the world the opportunity to take part and benefit from global trade  — — —  We all hope for the best in the future, join our vision and celebrate with us!  A big thank you from the ModulTrade team.

We want our contributors to have lots of opportunities for convenient and effective trading, including different exchanges. MTRc is already traded on Livecoin — you can check the volumes and current price on https://www.livecoin.net/en/trade/orderbook  Why did we choose Livecoin? Livecoin is a modern, safe Trading Platform for accessing cryptocurrency exchange markets and it has lots of benefits! Here are some of them:  Easy fiat deposit & withdrawal for users  Low commission for traders — starting from 0,02% per operation  Easy and convenient interface  We would like to remind, that will are fully focused on MT Products improving and we are not eager to spend significant amounts on several exchanges — it will slightly cut the Product Development budget.  We also want to you to try our improved MT Wallet and share your experience with us https://wallet.modultrade.com  Have a nice weekend,  ModulTrade Team

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Dear Supporters,  We follow the policy of full transparency and would like to keep you updated on the progress with MTRc listing at exchanges.  As we stated during ModulTrade Token Distribution MTRc will be listed on reputable exchanges within 3 months after the end of the Sale (Jan, 30)  In March ModulTrade got confirmation from 2 exchanges for listing. One of the exchanges is proceeding with MTRc onboarding and there is 10-15% chance to be listed in March. The other exchange (planned for listing in March) unexpectedly indicated deposit of 100BTC to be blocked at exchange. Such amount is a significant amount for ModulTrade and will cut Product Development budget. Therefor this exchange is on hold until we negotiate reasonable terms.  Meanwhile we would like to assure that we have all confirmations from the reputable exchange for MTRc listing and you will see it traded as promised by ModulTrade team during the Token Distribution (3 months after Jan, 30).  We also would like to highlight that a primary goal of ModulTrade team is to start MTRc circulation within ModulTrade platform which will drive demand for MTRc and its organic price increase.  Follow us for the updates!

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, everybody!  Find ModulTrade Roadmap update below.  ModulTrade Team has been busy over the recent weeks to proudly announce our updated roadmap with some interesting upcoming events.  Within the next months, our team will develop three main items of ModulTrade Product which will intensify the usage of MTRc  MT4Mining — “All you need for mining”  MT Wallet — “Fiat/crypto gateway — Secure & Easy”  MT Button — “Trade Finance on the blockchain for Marketplaces”  In parallel MTRc will be listed on well known and reputable exchanges, ModulTrade will partner with market leaders in finance and other industries and will invite Strategic Investor to develop and launch together a new era in global trade.  MT4MINING — Global platform for crypto-mining industry  MT4Mining is our first implementation of the Modultrade core feature. It will provide the Letter of Credit on the blockchain secured with escrow smart contracts for each trade. We consider this specific marketplace as our test subject for the Modultrade core.  People can use the platform for buying and selling mining-related items. In addition, it is possible to buy and sell services complimentary to crypto-mining locally and globally like maintenance, colocation, and consulting.  We will spend a lot of time monitoring the progress of the platform and the needs of the users. In the future, we will be opening up more specific markets. This year we hope to reach over $10million in trades.  ModulTrade Wallet  We will present our own MTRc wallet that will give you the following opportunities:  Legitimate crypto/fiat gateway for corporates and individuals  Easy cryptocurrency transfer and exchange. Our wallet will support MTRc, BTC, and ETH  Easy payment on the ModulTrade marketplace for orders on our platform  By October , we want 10,000 registered users. The beta version of the wallet will be launched several months before.  Plugin MT Button for existing Marketplaces  We are working on a plugin button ‘Trade with ModulTrade’. This allows marketplaces to offer new user experience to its customers — secure trade and payment service on blockchain. Users can buy something on a website using ModulTrade platform functionality. It’s comparable with a PayPal ‘Buy Now’ button. By August, we want to integrate this button in three well-known marketplaces.  MTRc Exchange Listing  Within the next month MTRc will be listed on a well-known and reputable exchange. At the moment of writing, we are in the process of finalizing agreements. And within next 12 months, MTRc will be listed on more top exchanges.  MT Holding in Singapore, Strategic partnership and investor  ModulTrade will serve an Asia-Europe trade flow and will establish a holding company in Singapore to strengthen itself in Asia as well. Within next 6 months, a number of partnerships with market leaders will be established and ModulTrade will engage with a well known strategic investor.  Besides that, we are working hard on the platform itself. We are building relationships with crypto-mining and computer equipment producers, resellers and service providers. At last, we are as well working on defining the legal grounds for trade deals in target countries.  Execution of ModulTrade Roadmap will drive the usage and demand for MTRc. That should lead to a stable MTRc price increase within 2018. Users will start to use MTRc to trade on the platform. New investors will start buying MTRc on the secondary market at exchanges.  We expect a bright future for ModulTrade in 2018 and would like to share the success with our supporters, platform users and investors.  The very Best!  ModulTrade Team

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, boys and girls.  It's been some time and very busy time after we completed the token sale.  And the new chapter begins with the introduction of the exchanges, adding new services to our token holders and business development on the platform.  Till now, we have started with Etherdelta and Idex. We're on the job to start listing on some top exchanges very soon!  Apart from that, we have great news regarding alternative wallets and trackers. As regards to the business, we shall make some announcements soon!  So keep it up and stay tuned!   Bests, ModulTrade team

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade Token Distribution has successfully finished.  Over 7’500’000 MTRc have been distributed with a total nominal value over 10 000 ETH.  We would like to thank all of our 6000+ participants. To each and everyone of you, who supported us, helped us, start the revolution in global trade, we would like to express our sincere gratitude and commitment to delivering the vision.  Those of you who were not able participate in the token sale can still consider purchasing MTRc tokens once we launch on the exchanges — we will start with Etherdelta — the announcement of that will follow.  Also, once the tokens become tradable, all contributors will be notified via email and our Telegram channel. So please, be patient and we promise to answer all correspondence from our token sale participants promptly. However, be prepared that some delays may occur with our replies over next few days as the team will be busy with the ICO closure process.  Our next steps is to push onward with the development of the ModulTrade Platform and marketing efforts to secure our SME customer base. During the journey we will remain in touch and will continuously update you on our progress.  Once again, thank you, congratulations, and stay tuned  Find out more about ModulTrade and our Token Sale at https://en.modultrade.io  Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: Tonisim
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Understand the true value and utility of the MTRc token.    William Mougayar wrote a great article on tokenomics. He points out that many so-called ‘utility tokens’ don’t provide utility. Many projects do not evaluate the use of their token properly, resulting in a non-utility token being sold as a utility token.  We, ModulTrade, want to show the true value of our token by answering a selection of questions from William his article on ‘Tokenomics’ (1). We will answer each questions with Yes/No and provide a short explanation.  Is the token tied to a product usage, i.e. does it give the user exclusive access to it, or provide interaction rights to the product? Yes. It is the key to transact in ModulTrade (MT) Value Ecosystem, as all fees on trade contracts on MT platform will have to be paid in MTRc. ModulTrade builds a value ecosystem for global trade, i.e. a digital networked value structure that is real-time, global, connected, digital and cost-effective.  2. Does the token grant a governance action, like voting on a consensus related or other decision-making factor or does it grant an ownership of sorts? No.  The MTRc token gives no rights in ModulTrade company and doesn’t represent participation in the company.  3. Does the token enable the user to contribute to a value-adding action for the network or market that is being built? Yes.  For instance, third parties could build solutions within ModulTrade Value Ecosystem and on top of MT platform, whose usage will be charged in MTRC. It will also enable third-party developers / service providers to gain access to a wider target of users / clients, while reducing development and user acquisition costs.  4. Does the token result in a monetizable reward based on an action by the user (active work)? No.  There’s no reward for mining or other active work by the users. The value of MTRc token is determined by pure market forces (supply and demand). It is nothing like an equity stake that could entitle you to dividends.  5. Does the token grant the user a value based on sharing or disclosing some data about them (passive work)? Yes.  If we approach from that point that MTRc is the entry key to our ecosystem, then if we share someone’s data in our ecosystem it indirectly brings value to the token holder as the track records can provide more accurate risk profiling for lenders thus lower interest rates for users.  6. Is buying/selling something part of the business model and can users create a new product or service? Yes.  ModulTrade is a multi-sided platform business model; in order to work properly buyers and sellers must buy/sell their goods and third-party users must provide services / solutions that enrich the ecosystem.  7. Is the token required to run a smart contract? Yes.  8. Is the token required as a security deposit to secure some aspect of the blockchain’s operation? Yes.  There’s an escrow-account mechanism to provide trust between the buyer and the seller, and as well create a secure environment. The token will be staked in the smart contract which acts as an escrow agent.  9. Is the token used to pay for some usage? Yes.  Trade fees and usage of third-party solutions on the platform will be charged in MTRc.  10. Is the token required to join a network or other related entity? Yes.  The token is required to transact on the platform.  11. Is the token given away or offered at a discount, as an incentive to encourage product trial or usage? Yes.  12. Is the token your principal payment unit, essentially functioning as an internal currency? Yes.  Trade fees and usage of third-party solutions on the platform will be charged in MTRc as its the internal currency for MT platform.  13. Does your blockchain autonomously distribute profits to token holders? No.  Profits are not shared to token holders; the MTRc token gives no rights in ModulTrade company and doesn’t represent participation in the company.  Conclusion  The MTRc token is clearly a utility token being used as an internal currency within the ModulTrade Value Ecosystem. It will be used as well for charging usage fees for third-parties’ solution built around ModulTrade Service Platform. The token doesn’t return you dividends and as well doesn’t give you rights in ModulTrade, as that’s the definition of an equity token.  https://medium.com/@ModulTrade/understand-the-true-value-and-utility-of-the-mtrc-token-4e60a40512b6

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: The Global Revolution in Trade Finance  The revolution in Trade Finance is here. It is happening now and it is being led by ModulTrade – an innovative project, developing a global platform which may soon revolutionize the cross-border trade across the world.  Trade finance has long been seen as the preserve of banks to control and manage. Companies, unless they were big multinational concerns were often limited by choice and then forced to accept fee structures that along with currency risk instruments seriously cut into margins and rendered the whole exercise redundant.  No more, the ModulTrade platform effectively smashes the banking cartels and heralds a new era in freedom to pursue trade deals at minimum cost in time, revenue and process management.  The costs, lack of transparency and time taken to establish letters of credit meant the trade finance process was ripe for disruption. In 2016 four students from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) decided to challenge the status quo and launch a platform that would connect in real time buyers and sellers of goods, and put back trust into trading relationships.  The team’s bluechip background in commercial banking and commerce meant they understood the workflows and risk profiles, and being entrepreneurs saw the potential of how blockchain technology could deliver a transformational experience and operating system.  The key insight that the team landed upon was the use of smart contracts and how their application in a closed network would act to cover both the purchase and consignment of goods in real time. Advances in tracking systems and wider improvements in blockchains – the team have settled on the Ethereum network – meant that once the underlying architecture had been specced out, ModulTrade were able to move quickly to deliver a minimum viable project and engage with the potential customer.  Since launching the vision for the platform in September 2017 the team has found themselves in continuous discussions with both investors and businesses who seeing the potential of the system have been keen to become customers and backers of the project. In particular in Asia, in the emerging “One Belt, One Road” economic region the reception has proved to be overwhelmingly positive. This month on a recent trip back to China, ModulTrade signed a number of partnership agreements that will not only support the adoption of the platform as core conduit for trade through the region but will act to create an ongoing demand for MTRc, the ModulTrade token.  So as the ModulTrade token sale enters the last phase of completion investors should take comfort from the fact that: the list of advisors has increased and grown with more technical and market experts joining the team as the full benefits of the platform become apparent. The platform has been tested and is now operational, and working to make “democratization” of trade a reality. And that customers, large scale buyer, are engaged with ModulTrade to put orders on the system and stimulate growth.  Ultimately, all investors have to undertake their own due diligence on any project but in the case of ModulTrade, they have more than honored their commitments as set out in their white paper and have driven themselves to realize the vision, without compromise.  So the process of transformation in trade finance is happening, the revolution is real and the chance to be part of it, for a short time, still exists.   Source: http://www.livebitcoinnews.com/global-revolution-trade-finance/

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: URGENT: MARKET UPDATE: 3-DAY EXTENSION  The ModulTrade team has received a number of requests from ModulTrade community members who: - Were not able to contribute during the last few days due to an overload of the ModulTrade Token Distribution site - Have not been able to finalise purchases of crypto (ETH or BTC) by 27th of January to participate in ModulTrade Token Distribution: Therefore to support the community and to provide: a) ModulTrade community members with an ability to fulfill purchases and participate in the ModulTrade Token Distribution b) Parity, equal rights and benefits for all ModulTrade community members.  Our team has decided to extend the contribution period for ALL ModulTrade community members for another 3 days - until end of 30th of January. https://en.modultrade.io/  If you have any further questions on the extension or the raise or some of our recent announcements and partnerships, please reach out to the team on the Telegram channel: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO so we can advise you.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: MODULTRADE AND YANGTING INTERNET TECHNOLOGY ANNOUNCE STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP TO ALLOW SMEs TO EXPAND THEIR GLOBAL REACH  On Friday 26th January 2018, ModulTrade a blockchain based B2B global trade platform and Yangting Internet Technology, an investment vehicle for Alibaba, announce a strategic partnership to support SME customers using the Alibaba experience.  The agreement opens the door for Alibaba customer base to access new markets and find new partners through the ModulTrade Platform (MTP). ModulTrade operate an, order matching, payment and tracking system, using smart contracts on the ethereum blockchain. The system provides transparency and payment certainty without the need for letters of credit or bank guarantees.  The MTP has been designed for use by SMEs and is fully scalable across desktop, tablet and mobile devices and empowers businesses to create, join and manage supply chains knowing that counterparty risk has been removed through the use of the ModulTrade token — the MTRc.  Market participants conduct all business using the MTRc token, which acts to provide proof of funds and support trust across the ecosystem. The use of tokens to support trade and trade finance flows is a significant innovation within the fintech sector and as a result of the agreement is likely to gain greater traction both in Asia and Europe.  Alibaba and ModulTrade will collaborate to support the process of education on the platform and the use of the token, will open a dedicated office in China in Q2 2018, expanding the ModulTrade network of offices in Singapore, Russia and the UK.  Find out more about ModulTrade and our Token Sale at https://en.modultrade.io  Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade at Crypto Economy in London.  London, 25th January, following on from a successful series of meetings in Asia, ModulTrade CEO, Evgeny Kaplin arrived in London to participate in Crypto Economy, a two day event dedicated to token raises and ICO sales.  The presence of ModulTrade at Crypto Economy marks the beginning of the end of their own fundraising journey that in little over 5 months has seen them cross continents, join incubators, sit on numerous panels and win plaudits, top ratings and many friends in many markets for the ModulTrade platform.  In 2017, the world learnt about the opportunity to democratize international trade for SMEs and how the team had through the use of smart contracts set out to fix the lack of trust in cross border trade. The message of meet, commit and execute began to resonate across the globe and each week more and more people joined the Telegram channel and the movement to offer transparent and fair terms of business for enterprises; businesses who want to trade internationally but were being priced out of the market by high commissions and excessive charges for letters of credit and bank guarantees.  As much as ModulTrade have solved the problem of how to operate at scale, a fair and open trade ledger and supply chain, they have also highlighted a number of failures in the current model. Inequalities that have registered with small business owners and members of the public. As a result they have received extensive backing from industry and crowd sale participants, support that means 2018 will see the expansion of the platform and the start of the SME global trade economy.  The final day to participate, and buy the ModulTrade token: MTRc is drawing near and with the closure of sale, the beginning of a new journey, to deliver better process, better prices and ultimately better outcomes for the SMEs across the globe.  Find out more about ModulTrade and our Token Sale at https://en.modultrade.io  Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: That's true. The bigger the company the tougher is the transformation. Giant companies have to take care of their entire environment they live in. You can't simply update the webpage and start living a new life. It's totally a brand new approach as regards to the employes, business development, policies, IT infrastructure, business-partner relations and so on.  The utmost vulnerability is commanded by the market reaction and share price. Having blockchain industry and crypto-currency not regulated yet to the extent they treat it acceptable, the market majors are really sober and stay away from the fray. They wait for the right moment to step in.

Author: Rigorous
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: There are a lot of new decentralized exchanges, but I do now know how much volume and users they have. It is good that they are being developed, but the downside is that there is a lot of fragmentation of volume. The risk of that is a large spread between the buy and sell side. That could be solved somewhat with market makers on centralized exchanges where they can waive fees, but on decentralized exchanges? I do not have an answer, this is cutting edge technology.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Effect of globalization on international trade  This article will list up some key points which had an impact on international trade due to globalization. In addition, we think that globalization is still an ongoing process. ModulTrade helps companies to even further globalize.  Interconnectedness Globalization has resulted in greater interconnectedness among markets around the world and increased communication and awareness of business opportunities in the far corners of the globe. More investors can access new investment opportunities and study new markets at a greater distance than before. Potential risks and profit opportunities are within easier reach thanks to improved communications technology. Products and services previously available within one country are made available to new markets outside the country due to globalization. In addition, countries with positive relations between them are able to increasingly unify their economies through increased investment and trade.  Maintaining Competitiveness Globalization has had the effect of increased competition. Companies are broadening their target area, expanding from local areas and home countries to the rest of the world. Suddenly, some companies are fighting strong competition from outside their home country. This forced them to source materials and outsource labor from other countries. This story of ‘sourcing and outsourcing’ turned many companies into global ones, actively seeking for production locations and partners for new ventures. Globalization has facilitated this and made the transition to global markets easier.  Technology and Efficiency More advanced systems are needed to facilitate global trade. Globalization pushed us to create better systems to track international trade. ERP systems are one of the solutions provided to support global trade.  Enterprise resource planning (ERP) is a process by which a company (often a manufacturer) manages and integrates the important parts of its business. An ERP management information system integrates areas such as planning, purchasing, inventory, sales, marketing, finance and human resources.  This technological innovation in global trade has enabled a more efficient environment. Technology empowers efficiency in global trade and reduces cost and time. In addition, production processes became more efficient due to globalization as companies want to maintain their competitive advantage.  However, we still find a gap between globalization and blockchain. Blockchain could help companies become even more ‘global’. It helps companies to save time and money, storing data tamper-proof and improving communication.  Companies could use smart contracts in which they can define their business rules. These smart contracts can be used when trading with other companies, creating an environment of trust. ModulTrade provides such a platform where companies can trade safely using smart contracts acting as an escrow, including all business criteria.  Find out more about ModulTrade and our Token Sale at https://en.modultrade.io  Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.  Sources: (1) https://www.avekon.org/papers/1374.pdf (2) What is an ERP: https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/erp.asp (3) https://www.investopedia.com/ask/answers/022615/what-effect-has-globalization-had-international-investments.asp (4) http://www.globalization101.org/trade-introduction/ (5) The impact of globalisation and increased trade liberalisation on European regions: http://ec.europa.eu/regional_policy/sources/docgener/studies/pdf/impact_liberalisation.pdf

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Blockchain Industry SWOT Analysis — Global Trade Finance  Everyone says the blockchain, the technology underpinning cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin, is going to change everything. And yet, after years of tireless effort and billions of dollars invested, nobody has actually come up with a use for the blockchain — besides currency speculation and illegal transactions. Whilst we have to admit that blockchain is still in its infancy. Many issues like unwanted centralization, slow transaction verification times and low throughput aren’t easy to solve. We have to try and find a happy medium between security and speed. Many use cases of supply chain management using blockchain have been proposed, built and tested. But, did they think twice about this decision, or are they just driven by the hype? Let’s create a simple SWOT analysis to get a better image of blockchain in global trade finance.  Strengths Operational Efficiency Facilitates easier sharing of information about certain products or trades. No more documents that have to passed along. We can now register everything on the blockchain. Secure encryption and tamper-proof data storage. Eliminates central authority who has full access to the data.  Opportunities Provides a platform for Big Data and analytic research. Gives back control to the user e.g. instead of Google and Facebook using your data, you can control who gets access to your data. All these permissions will be stored on the blockchain. The world is becoming more digital, so more people will accept the concept of blockchain in their daily lives.  Threats Scalability issues: too many transactions (overload), although several solutions are present. Unwanted centralization: mining pools and large mining farms. Quantum computers (in the future) who have the ability to decrypt data. Hype and fast changing environment. There is always the possibility of mining attacks, and hacks.  Weaknesses Business rules change frequently, blockchain doesn’t. Blockchain is mostly not modular. An old encryption module cannot easily be replaced. What if business rules change and we want to export data to a new blockchain with the correct data models? A blockchain doesn’t provide an immediate out-of-the-box exit strategy. Potentially in conflict with existing approaches to regulatory compliance, for example GDPR regulations. Concept isn’t easy to grasp for a newcomer. We need good education to make mass adoption possible.  Conclusion ModulTrade aims at bridging the gap between trade finance and blockchain by offering an easy to use platform for global trade. The platform makes use of blockchain technology to enforce trust, traceability and transparency. ModulTrade has the power to disrupt global trade finance because it can help you to cut bureaucracy costs and make the trade process more efficient.  Find out more about ModulTrade and our Token Sale at https://en.modultrade.io  Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.  (1) https://hackernoon.com/ten-years-in-nobody-has-come-up-with-a-use-case-for-blockchain-ee98c180100

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, boys and girls!  The message talks about a suspicious invitation via email to buy tokens where you're requested to provide details of your wallet and etc. We know that scammers may copy us. And they use different tricks.  But we don't. We openly declare that we appreciate an integrity of our clients and we act accordingly!  We believe it's pretty clear here without any double meaning.  We do invite to participate our token sale and propose visiting our dedicated page at modultrade.io.  In any of the cases you're always welcome to communicate and share your opinion with us through all channels that we're in  Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/  and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade  You may also write to us at hello@modultrade.com and tokensale@modultrade.io. Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: China trade opens potential of ModulTrade platform    The initial MTP China Roadshow was undertaken in January to gain exposure across China’s iconic and major cities: Shenzhen (9th/10th), Guangzhou (11th), Hangzhou (12th), Beijing (13th). As a result, It’s been a very rewarding and fruitful journey, with tremendous achievement in the launching of the MTP strategy in one of the most important market’s in global trade – China.  During the roadshow, several mutually beneficial and productive meetings took place with a targeted group of potential business partners, such as suppliers, bankers, investment companies, private investors, logistics participators and associations, governmental resources partners, crypto exchange platforms, media experts and KOL.    Following said discussions, we are pleased to share some of our key highlights and developments, below. These are all instrumental to the development and expansion of the MTP, to the benefit of both users and partners and we are looking forward to taking these further down the line. Miners Suppliers  We met with iconic mining factories such as BW, Panda miners, Yibite, and Avalon, based in two of the most prestigious regions of Shenzhen and Hangzhou. These companies are onboard and have signed agreements with concrete plans to put their products on the MTP. This strategic move of bringing key miners into the global trade flow through the MTP has been agreed in line with the timeline to make it happen.    2. Investment companies, groups and individual investors We’ve met with local investment companies, groups and individual investors, who expressed interest in exploring the possibility of investing into the platform with serious plans for evaluation and follow-up. This feedback maintains the very positive feedback on the pioneering endeavors of applying Blockchain technology to B2B global trade.  Special credit and thanks goes to Sail group, Ucaninv investment company, YK investment group, along with the individual investors who we had the pleasure of meeting.    3. Chinese Crypto platform To be more user-friendly in China, the MTP spoke with some of the most prestigious and fast growing crypto platforms, such as ZB, EXX, and 8BTC. A few cooperative frameworks have been agreed to go with an action plan to get STQ into the list, to allow easy and secure access for the millions of potential Chinese investors.    4. Association and governmental resources partners We’ve had rewarding meetings and visits with local associations and partners who have governmental resources and backing: such as, Guangdong logistics associations, the governmental-authorised association to cluster the logistics-related ecosystem, with wide variety of suppliers, logistics services providers, and government involvement.  One notable example is P.G logistics, one of the top integrated SCM solution providers in China, with 80 rep offices throughout China. Cooperation from such B2B business will be carried out within an agreed portfolio and timeline.    5. Media experts and KOL Media and industry KOL has always been a critical part for entry into the Chinese market, and our roadshow returned some solid responses from Media experts and KOL. We have been in discussion with some of the most credible finance and high tech media outlets,s such as DailyFX, Tecent Finance Guangdong, ifinance channel of Ifeng, and feedback has been very positive with talk of excitement and anticipation on the bright future of MTP. Some specific cooperative plans from a local media and marketing perspective have been reached, with more to follow.    Why China and its four key economic hubs?  To give you an insight into why ModulTrade has selected China to expand its MTP, see below details on each of the four regions visited during the roadshow, with their individual appeal and benefits.  Shenzhen — The center of high technology and information technology manufacturing center, one of the most famous production zone for miners globally and with favorable industry force for Blockchain technology;  Guangzhou — the south gate of China, and the center of one of the most dynamic economic center Pearl River Delta, also gains its huge fame of the international trading center for the century trading platform — CANTON FAIR  Hangzhou — A city with great importance and significance for the Ecommerce industry, where the head quarter of Alibaba, locates, and very dynamic ecosystem of online business, along with the startup entrepreneurs and business endeavors for new and high technology, such as crypto investment, Blockchain technology. It is, also the one of most important centers for miner producers.  Beijing — Capital of China with favorable economic and political environment throughout the whole country, an ideal place to leverage the 1st tiers of the top investors and companies from China for the varieties of directions, including Blockchain technology.  Find out more about ModulTrade and our Token Sale at https://en.modultrade.io  Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: filsid
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Blockchain Industry SWOT Analysis — Global Trade Finance  Everyone says the blockchain, the technology underpinning cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin, is going to change everything. And yet, after years of tireless effort and billions of dollars invested, nobody has actually come up with a use for the blockchain — besides currency speculation and illegal transactions.  Whilst we have to admit that blockchain is still in its infancy. Many issues like unwanted centralization, slow transaction verification times and low throughput aren’t easy to solve. We have to try and find a happy medium between security and speed.  Many use cases of supply chain management using blockchain have been proposed, built and tested. But, did they think twice about this decision, or are they just driven by the hype? Let’s create a simple SWOT analysis to get a better image of blockchain in global trade finance.  https://medium.com/@ModulTrade/blockchain-industry-swot-analysis-global-trade-finance-bf04c9b2d27d

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: How Blockchain Can Restore Trust in Global Trade   During a time when transparency matters more than ever, enter blockchain. Global trade does have a problem, with a global trade finance gap of about $1.6 trillion globally (source) and 56% of SME trade finance proposals are rejected. The root of the problem lies in the lack of trust between counterparties who don’t know each other and the typical solution is the letter of credit (LoC), that is outrageously costly (up to 4–15%). It harms businesses and consumers alike. Those involved in international trade — whether manufacturers, trading houses, transportation companies or banks — are seeking ways to ease the situation and cut time and costs. The process — from issuing to approval of the letter of credit, which usually takes between seven and 10 days — could be reduced to less than four hours when using blockchain. A common trade finance offering provided by banks, and increasingly by alternative financial services providers, is known as factoring, and involves a bank paying the seller of goods before the buyer of those goods makes the payment. Naturally, banks charge rates — typically 4 percent to as high as 8 percent — to the supplier for this service, but assume the risk that the buyer delays payment or even defaults. Despite that protection, factoring is a costly undertaking for suppliers, eating significantly into margins and introducing an element of insecurity to the payment picture. And setting risk aside, processing costs related to manual work, document collection and coordination of remittances are high. Blockchain has the power to reduce risk, costs and time for both parties, without the need of a bank cutting your profit margins. Modultrade, our initiative, tries to reduce risk by enforcing trust on the platform we are developing. We aim for helping MSMEs to meet, commit and execute trade globally easily, in a trustful and efficiently manner. The use of smart contracts acting as an escrow service is our main focus because they have the power to reduce risk and costs for both parties. The simplified workflow of the smart contract is as follows. 1) The Buyer deposits funds into the smart contract which acts as an escrow agent. 2) Funds are locked in the smart contract until release conditions are met to impose trust. 3) Funds are released to the Seller upon successful delivery in a specified time horizon. 4) Funds are released to the Buyer if no delivery occurs in a specified time horizon.    A fee is still required when using the escrow service, however this will be a much lower fee than traditional fees charged by banks to deliver this service. ModulTrade just requires a 1% fee, which will be paid with the internal currency MTRc (ModulTrade token), issued by ModulTrade. The MTRc token will act as an efficient instrument of value exchange in the ModulTrade ecosystem.  Begin to restore trust in Global Trade!  Find out more about ModulTrade and our Token Sale at https://en.modultrade.io Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: We appreciate your interest in our token sale a lot! So we are proudly announcing the start of referral program! You are welcomed to invite your friends and get bonuses yourselves. The referral conditions are as follows: — up to 20ETH — 3% — from 21 to 50ETH — 4% — above 51ETH — 5%  Bonus MTRC are calculated on the total amount of referred buys and transferred to your wallet at the end of the token sale.  To take part in referral program follow next steps: 1) Sign In into your profile at https://en.modultrade.io/users/sign_in 2) You will find field "Your referral link" at the bottom of the page 3) Copy it carefully 4) And paste into your post or send to your friends   Have a nice Friday!

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: 11 January 2018 in GUANGZHOU ModulTrade team held the meeting with a prominent Chinese financial analytic Andy Fang. He assessed the Modul Trade project concept and strongly supported the project idea. He also emphasized significant advantages that ModulTrade platform can offer to the majority of small and medium e-commerce businesses in China. As a follow-up from that meeting, Andy Fang will join seminars and other public events organized by ModulTrade in order to support them as a reputable opinion leader. http://amp.gs/GvBJ

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade Opens the World of Trading to Small Business  The ICO, already filling its minimum soft cap, offers a viable product to help small business trade freely without restrictions.  ModulTrade aims to remove the barriers of entry into global asset trading, opening the doors for small and medium enterprises. The approach of ModulTrade has four key components: blockchain-based smart contracts, an already functioning trading platform, an up and growing reputation network and marketplaces for various assets.  ModulTrade is here to remove the barriers and lower the fees levied by investment intermediaries and banks, and produce a more democratic system of global trading for any-size companies.  "The way we are building the ModulTrade platform means that any user, from anywhere in the world, at any time, will be able to monitor and review their own trade cycle. There are 400mln MSMEs worldwide, and 56% of these have their finance proposals rejected compared to only 7% of larger companies. This is a massive discrepancy, and ModulTrade’s Value Eco-system (MVE) aims to narrow this gap considerably," noted the project's founder and CEO, Evgeny Kaplin. In addition to running a successful trading platform, the ModulTrade ICO is already gaining speed. More than 5.7 million MTRc coins have been sold in a pre-sale, with a nominal value of 8,196 Ethereum. The ICO is ongoing, with funds accepted in Bitcoin and Ethereum, as well as fiat for larger investors backing the sale with more than $10,000.  The reputation of ModulTrade precedes its ICO, with high grades and accolades from reviewing companies. ICO Bench has given the project a 4.4 high rating, while ICORating has given a "Low" risk rating. CIO Review has lined up ModulTrade as a Top 20 Blockchain Startup in 2017.  ModulTrade will emulate letters of credit and bank guarantees through Ethereum-based smart contracts, thus achieving a real-life application of the power of the blockchain.  The ModulTrade token sale event is in Phase 3 right now, offering a 10% discount off the token price at 700 MTRc for 1 ETH. Phase 3 continues until January 8.    source: https://cryptovest.com/news/modultrade-opens-the-world-of-trading-to-small-business/
