Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, boys and girls!  Happy to see your enthusiasm and participation. It's very encouraging and incredibly important. There've been many talks re definitive list of exchanges. Many of you expressed pros and cons of being floated here and there. All this far and wide discussion is needed to build a common opinion within the community.  However, as it was rightly stated by some of the respectful speakers, we focus on delivering so-demanded solution to the millions of MSMEs across the globe and at the same time creating a new channel for many many 3rd party trade-related service providers, so utility token will be as lucrative as we could stick closer to the roadmap or ahead of it.  Hence, after all, we believe that our utility token itself shall be greatly demanded by business actors as well as the crypto community. And still we have a road to go as we're gaining ground.  So thanks a ton to all of you. Stay tuned. Updates follow.    Regards, ModulTrade team

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade expands and makes the “World of Trade” smaller  Democratization of trade is coming, fast to certain markets. Companies are waking up to the benefits of equality, transparency and trust in business delivered through the ModulTrade platform. And in 2018 users in from China, Russia, Germany, UK, France, Argentina, Mexico, Brazil, USA, India, Vietnam, Italy, Slovakia, Spain, and Cyprus, will be able to use the system in their native language. The Modultrade team have invested heavily in making the platform interface user friendly and flexible to the customer’s needs. The initial challenge was translating cross-border trade flows and process to mobile devices, the small screen and making it work at scale. The second challenge has been to make the application native to the user, allowing them to be understood in their local language yet trade globally without comprise. Everyday, as the network grows the team act to translate the platform to the local market and in turn are making the world of trade a smaller place, in which to connect, transact and grow. The focus for the ModulTrade team in 2018 is in reaching out to new territories, with particular attention being on supporting the trade flows between Europe and Asia. Initially the team are working to ensure that the platform can support all cryptocurrency trade flows between the regions. Thereafter, the focus will extend on out into the construction industry and from there, moving quickly onwards and outwards into other sectors. Always with the message of trade transparency and flexibility. By the end of 2018 the intention is to make the platform truly global, set up for expansion across all sectors. So as the Sun nearly sets on the year 2017, small and medium sized businesses can be sure that it will rise soon in their region, spreading opportunity and empowerment. To join the expansion and pioneer growth in new territories and sectors join the main sale, which is open, and until 8th January 2018 you can get 10% off your tokens. Visit our website to find out more https://en.modultrade.io/ Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

It is an update but it is still the same great idea and a great proposition: democratizing global trade. We look forward to welcoming you on the site: https://en.modultrade.io/ So have a look and share your feedback with the team on Telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello. The goals are very well listed and we're happy to share it.  There're major development pillars of the project: - technical development - development of the platform, inclusive of bilateral and unilateral smart-contract with advanced support for the local legislation, payments gateway in MTRC and other cryptocurrencies and fiat, support major actors in MT ecosystem; - ecosystem creation - trade and reputational bank in MTRC, 3rd party integration (logistics & financing, insurance/tax/accounting/customs/trade finance support, storage and warehousing); - geographical expansion - starting with 3 countries moving ahead to European, Asian, emerging and developed countries markets.  In a broader sense, ModulTrade is pursuing the following objectives: 1. MT monetizes on trade potential of 400mln SMEs in the world in 6.7mln e-commerce market  MT provides end-to-end service for the full B2B trade cycle at 1% vs.5-15% charged by banks or Alibaba, Amazon. MT is an open eco-system which is platform based, data reach and capital light. 2. Provide simple UX for any person who is not familiar with Blockchain or Cryptocurrency.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: A look back on ModulTrade’s project to date.   As we draw closer to the end of another year, we have been reflecting on all the great milestones we have achieved at ModulTrade. We have experienced some significant successes, received amazing support as well as overcome some hurdles! From roadshows, interviews, launches and recently reaching our token sale soft cap, we’ve been on a tremendous journey while continuing to develop to take the project further along its roadmap. Here’s a look at all our key moments to date.  October 2016 — Four MIT graduates meet to create a blockchain based global trade platform 3rd October — ModulTrade token pre-sale opens 4th October — ModulTrade presents at the Blockchain Solutions Forum in Barcelona 9th October — Bernard Lietaer joins the advisory board 31st October — ModulTrade listed and rated by ICOBench 14th November — Founder Space Incubation San Francisco 16th November — ModulTrade appointed as one of Top 20 Most Promising Blockchain Technology Solution Providers by CIO Review 20TH November — Launch of the fully functioning ModulTrade Platform 20th November — MTRc listed trading on EtherDelta 20th November — Collaboration with LAToken 21st November — ModulTrade Platform officially launched 28th November — Main token sale start opens 30th November — ModulTrade scored highly on ICORating 7th December — Soft cap of 5mln MTRc reached 10th December — Total of 14 experts on the advisory board 28th December — Over 2200 people following the ModulTrade sale on Telegram  Here’s to more great milestones for the ModulTrade project! Our main sale is open, and you can get 10% off until 8th January 2018. Visit our website to find out more https://en.modultrade.io/ Join us on telegram https://t.me/ModulTradeIO Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Top Talent Join the ModulTrade team in 2017.  Since inception, the ModulTrade vision of a fair, open trade system for small businesses; a “democratization of global trade” has generated interest and attracted supporters in the business community. And in 2017 the initial founding team of four, found out just how popular that had vision had become, with some of the leading names in blockchain technology and trade finance joining the team and acting to support the business mission: to put an innovative model of trust (back) into international trade, connect SMEs in a transparent ecosystem, and ultimately spread the message.  Advisors include: Bernard Lietaer — Expert in the design of currency systems Richard Schwenke — MD of Contorion, Germany, expert in B2B ecommerce Andrea Costantini — VP Agrati Group Italy Richard Watts — Founder HR Maritime Expert in global trade operations Dmitry Lazarichev — Founder Wirex, pioneer of mobile crypto banking Kelvin Tan — Former Deputy Director Monetary Authority of Singapore, Co founder GTR Ventures Andrea Monaco — COO, VI.BE.MAC.Spa, Italy Angelica Lips da Cruz — Expert in digital finance systems Sebastiano Picone — Commercial Director MoneyFarm, Italy Valentin Preobrazhensky — CEO of LAToken, co-founder of Zalogo Richard Ramos — GM Insight Technology, France Daniele Azzaro — Strategic Consultant, expert in prevention of financial crime Christian-Laurent Bonte — widely experienced executive in FinTech systems Philippe Taillet — Senior VP Operations Pan Europe, Sodexo Desmond Marshall — Founder Rouge Ventures, expert in crypto and blockchain investment  The board of Advisors has also been key in helping drive adoption of the platform, using their experience in banking and international trade as well as technology to support the functionality of the platform and make introductions, open doors to markets and sectors. Ultimately this wealth of talent has accelerated the interest in the project and means that ModulTrade has registered users — business owners, in China, across the European Union (Germany, France, Italy etc) Eastern Europe, UK, Russia, Singapore and South Korea, set to use the platform. From its beginnings ModulTrade has seen itself as cross- border enterprise, through the efforts of its Advisors it is now international and in 2018 will be truly global.  At the end of 2017 the core team of 4 is now expanded to 25, with advisors and staff working across 7 jurisdictions, 24/7, to deliver in 2018 change and transformation in trade finance that will act to materially improve the lives of tens of thousands of people. So for business owners and individuals it is now time to join the wider team of users, and register to participate in the MTRc sale.  Main sale is open, and you can get 10% off until 8th January 2018. Visit our website to find out more https://en.modultrade.io/  Join us on telegram https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: segomawut
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Note that the Tradingene platform does not participate in trading, it simply provides the infrastructure for creating algorithms, entering the stock exchanges, as well as for making agreements between investors, creators and other parties. As for artificial intelligence, it is possible that one of the creators will write an algorithm that will employ it, but so far this is just a promising idea. Neural networks and machine learning has been already been implemented in Tradingene services, in particular, in analytics.

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello. There're some projects that try to solve quite similar problem but still have some picularities.  Monetha deals with retail trade in eCommerce. Populous is an invoice financing auction type platform for merchants. Debitum is a P2P lending platform for trade enterprises. And some other less visible.  Meaning that all of them are using smart-contract in trade-related transactions.  Please treat the above mentioned for non-promotional use only!

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: The Modultrade Platform, a New Blockchain Based Global Trade Marketplace  The ModulTrade project seeks to democratize global trade, through the development of the ModulTrade Platform (MTP) – a secure and trusted online environment where micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) can meet, commit and execute trade. The MTP is built on blockchain technology to provide a secure platform, with smart-contracts in place to replicate traditional trade instruments such as letters of credit and bank guarantees. Transaction fees at MTP are as low as 1% (compared to bank charges of anything between 5-15%), crucially saving businesses money. ModulTrade officially launched the fully-functional version of MTP on 21 November, 2017.  Recently, the MTP executed the first successful blockchain based trade from China, with goods successfully delivered to Russia. The whole process was seamless, with the sellers’ confidence in successful receipt of payment secured in the knowledge of the smart-contracts locking in funds right up until the product was delivered to the buyer. This is a huge milestone in not only the development of the MTP, but for the wider global trade and fintech industries. Explore the possibilities of digital global trade on our MTP.  In conjunction with the MTP launch, ModulTrade have created their own crypto currency, the MTRc architected on the standard ERC-20. The MTRc can be used for payment of products and services within the platform, as well as other compatible currencies such as ETH. The MTRc will also be used for charging trading and usage fees for third parties’ service and solutions. If you’re a business in need of funds, the MTRc token can be borrowed, following reputational checks.  ModulTrade are in full swing with their token main sale, offering participants the opportunity to be a part of a revolutionary change in global trade. Current special bonus is 15% until 26th December, 2017.  Discover more here: https://en.modultrade.io/

Another problem could be that the buyer and seller don't agree on the quality so one party wants to get payed while the other wants a new delivery or a refund. In the real world you would end up in front of a court but maybe ther's some smart way to solve it on the blockchain as well.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: No gamble starting from the first trade. Once the buyer accepts the proposal he sends money to the smart-contract that keeps the funds locked till the goods are delivered to the buyer. So if the seller fails to send the goods, money are released back to the buyer without any escalation automatically.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade’s Product development and Market lead Vitaly Pykhtin interviews advisor Richard Watts  Watch our interview with ModulTrade advisor, Richard Watts, founder and Managing Director of HR Maritime, as he talks about the current trade finance and supply chain finance industry, the need for the ModulTrade Platform and how the time now is right for such a solution, which enables micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) to trade with freedom and trust.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3A24nNj5eDs&feature=youtu.be  In summary, the key points from the interview: 1. Present industry overview shows the massive shift in the world of trading. Trading companies are getting bigger and medium sized companies are disappearing due to lack of access to trade finance instruments. 2. 10 years ago, we didn’t have the technology to build out such a solution like ModulTrade. Now, we do and more and more companies, like Uber for example, are creating new platforms which cut out the middleman to create an easy and streamlined user experience. 3. ModulTrade has a large scope for the future while the system is ideally suited for MSMEs as it facilitates the access and the contact between buyer and the seller. The Blockchain technology solution is great as it solves the issue of trust by guaranteeing payment of goods through smart-contracts. 4. In the short run the ModulTrade Platform will be immediately demanded by ready manufactured goods traders rather than commodity. 5. The platform will give access to smaller players to participate in global trade, with traditional trading houses having to ‘share their piece of the trade pie’.  Our main sale is running with a 15% discount until 26 December. Visit our website to join us in revolutionizing global trade: https://en.modultrade.io/  Our product platform: https://product.modultrade.com/meet  Talk to us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter: https://twitter.com/ModulTrade.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Revolutionizing global B2B trade with new digital currency MTRc  ModulTrade launched one of the first blockchain based global trade platforms in November. The digital marketplace allows micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) from anywhere in the world. Thus, to trade with freedom, on a secure and trusted network. The application of smart-contracts replicates traditional trade finance instruments such as letters of credit and bank guarantees. Since adding a layer of security and instilles trust as funds are locked in right up until goods are delivered.  In conjunction with the development of the ModulTrade Platform (MTP), the team created a new crypto currency, the MTRc – an ERC-20 based token. The MTRc can be in use for payment of products and services within the platform. As well as other currencies such as ETH compatible to be in use on the MTP. The MTRc will also be in use for charging trading and usage fees for third parties’ service and solutions. If you’re a business in need of funds, the MTRc token can be borrow, following reputational checks.  With an estimate 400mln MSMEs worldwide, and 56% of such companies trade proposals rejected by traditional institutions. The MTP provides a much needed solution to companies who want to complete a full trade successfully. However,  in a trusted environment, grow their enterprises and play in the same field as larger counterparts.  As well as providing a new-found opportunity, the value of the MTRc is to increase. The growth is usually relies on the growth in number of users and the potential number of users. Since as we have outlined stands at a huge 400mln MSMEs. Of course, there needs to be a minimum level of adoption, but with the ModulTrade’s core team making every effort to on-board users, and the outstanding benefits of the MTP, it is set to be a success, and in turn the MTRc has great potential in increasing in value over the coming years.  Overall, thanks to the creation of the MTRc every business with access to a smartphone or desktop will be able to operate global trade (trade enabler), every service provider will be able to offer their services on MTP (service enabler) and every software developer will be able to build their applications on the top of MTP (3rd party application enabler).  In the future, the introduction of MTRc into the digital currency world will make it easier to trade, minimise costs and increase efficiencies. Further fintech solutions will benefit from this new token, as well as from the technology built to power the MTP. Developers will benefit from leveraging on the existing infrastructure, rather than spend time and money to develop their own eco-system.  Together, the MTP and MTRc, solve the current global trade problems such as lack of trust and rejected trade proposals, by offering real-time global trade on a digital network, a safe and secure platform and all at a much lower cost to the user.  Visit https://modultrade.io/ to use the MTP and join in our sale.

Author: MandatoryOption

Author: magisterr
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Dev said about him few post above:   Quote Vast Strategic Experience - Over 200+ companies for strategic advisory from startups to established listco - Honorary Associate Dean for Zhijing Houde Investor Business School - Founder for Hong Kong's first Angel Investor development focused program, Angel Investors Forum - Founder for Hong Kong's largest intentional entrepreneur investor funding event, Pitch Perfect - Rebuilt failing China's largest online music community, Sogua Entertainment; successfully repackaged, upgraded, and sold to VC firm - Lead Checkpoint (NYSE: CKP) into new strategic luxury development division; developed and successfully sold division to world's leading 3M - Developed Asia Pacific operations for Young & Rubicam spinoff division Wundermann. - Angel Investor + strategic mgt of VC related projects for firms - Seasoned strategist and public speaker on motivation of Chinese customers, developing loyalties, esp for high end, luxury, HNWI - Worked and partnered with many famous luxury brands and companies in China and around the world, including Fortune 500 names Rolls Royce, JP Morgan, Bank of East Asia, L'Oreal group, etc - Saved China's first and foremost online music company, sogua.com; successfully repackaged and sold business to venture capitalist firm - Directed and developed Checkpoint's new global busuiness initiative; successfully sold entire worldwide business division to 3M - Worked with various venture capitalists firms and partners in Asia for business model enhancements - Managed global operations and people in over 12 countries in Asia Pacific -  Developed the first e-commerce strategy and business model for IBM Greater China - Strategy consultant for several GMs in IBM  Titles Member of global Enterprise Ethereum Alliance (https://entethalliance.org) Current - Advisor to HKSAR Government, Trade and Industry Department Current - Executive Trainer, Federation of Hong Kong Industries Current - MD, Rouge Ventures Current - Managing Director, Rouge Current - Board member for City University of HK, MBA Alumni Association Current - Chairman, Institute of China Customer Motivation

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello.  We're very excited to have Desmond on our AB!  He's got a vast experience and a long professional track-record.  Here are some key latest details.  Vast Strategic Experience - Over 200+ companies for strategic advisory from startups to established listco - Honorary Associate Dean for Zhijing Houde Investor Business School - Founder for Hong Kong's first Angel Investor development focused program, Angel Investors Forum - Founder for Hong Kong's largest intentional entrepreneur investor funding event, Pitch Perfect - Rebuilt failing China's largest online music community, Sogua Entertainment; successfully repackaged, upgraded, and sold to VC firm - Lead Checkpoint (NYSE: CKP) into new strategic luxury development division; developed and successfully sold division to world's leading 3M - Developed Asia Pacific operations for Young & Rubicam spinoff division Wundermann. - Angel Investor + strategic mgt of VC related projects for firms - Seasoned strategist and public speaker on motivation of Chinese customers, developing loyalties, esp for high end, luxury, HNWI - Worked and partnered with many famous luxury brands and companies in China and around the world, including Fortune 500 names Rolls Royce, JP Morgan, Bank of East Asia, L'Oreal group, etc - Saved China's first and foremost online music company, sogua.com; successfully repackaged and sold business to venture capitalist firm - Directed and developed Checkpoint's new global busuiness initiative; successfully sold entire worldwide business division to 3M - Worked with various venture capitalists firms and partners in Asia for business model enhancements - Managed global operations and people in over 12 countries in Asia Pacific -  Developed the first e-commerce strategy and business model for IBM Greater China - Strategy consultant for several GMs in IBM  Titles Member of global Enterprise Ethereum Alliance (https://entethalliance.org) Current - Advisor to HKSAR Government, Trade and Industry Department Current - Executive Trainer, Federation of Hong Kong Industries Current - MD, Rouge Ventures Current - Managing Director, Rouge Current - Board member for City University of HK, MBA Alumni Association Current - Chairman, Institute of China Customer Motivation

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello. You're absolutely right, the ModuleTrade platform provides a marketplace where counterparties can meet each other, commit the conditions and execute the transactions. In order to make user experience the best possible, ModulTrade develops an ecosystem that combines under the same roof 3rd party trade-related service providers such as logistics, inspection, customs and tax consulting, etc.  Ultimately, ModulTrade provides the benefits that are translated into lower transaction cost, wider global reach and sustainable business growth.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade joins “One Belt One Road”, by setting a new standard for the entire eCommerce industry and completes first full trade cycle with China.  In light of the “One Belt One Road” initiative of Chinese People’s Republic that is expected to bridge the ‘infrastructure gap’ to accelerate economic growth across the Asia Pacific area and Central and Eastern Europe, it’s extremely important to develop the regions into a cohesive economic area through building infrastructure, increasing cultural exchanges, and broadening trade routes. Anticipated cumulative investment over an indefinite time scale is estimated at US$4 trillion or US$8 trillion.  As far as economic ties and trade expansion go, the lion share is devoted to small and medium enterprises who are undeniably the backbone of the economic growth in the world.  In support of bridging said infrastructure gap, ModulTrade have found themselves in a unique position by providing a means of developing the economic growth in China, as the company has a great focus supporting the abundant Chinese small and medium enterprises who are seeking global opportunities to expand and explore the untapped potential of cross-border trade.  But how is this pioneering company doing this? ModulTrade has created a new digital trade hub, the ModulTrade Platform (MTP), built on blockchain technology and applying smart-contracts to replicate the traditional trade processes such as letters of credit and bank guarantees, but at a much lesser cost to the user and with increased trust between the buyer and seller.  The MTP serves users with easy to use tools to successfully complete a trade cycle between countries. In addition to the existing functionalities, ModulTrade has taken steps to further make the MTP catered to small and medium enterprises specifically in China, by developing the webpage and product interface in the Chinese language and integrating China Post and S.F. Express as a 3rd party service provider for delivery of the goods.  With its global ambition, ModulTrade has impacted the entire eCommerce industry as it has supported the first batch of goods sold from China on the blockchain via the MTP in early December, with payment made entirely in cryptocurrency (ETH). As stipulated in the smart-contract by the transaction counterparties, the goods were prepared for dispatch and securely shipped cross-border by local delivery company China Post, and delivered to the buyer by Russian post in Moscow, Russia. The carrier carefully inspected and packed the goods for the shipment. The buyer received the parcel at their doorstep in a weeks’ time and was absolutely satisfied with the quality of the goods, the delivery service and the ease of executing the trade on the MTP. Right after the parcel receipt, the correspondent amount in ETH automatically transferred via the smart-contract and hit the wallet of Chinese seller immediately. As a result of executing trade on the MTP, both parties saved considerable time and a significant amount of money.  As one of the core ambitions of ModulTrade is to allow micro, small and medium enterprises to trade with ease from anywhere in the world, coupled with the success of the first trade from China on the blockchain, we can proudly declare that our platform connects the continents and addresses the needs for global trade participation. And we’re more than happy to welcome all businesses and enterprises to join us in this revolutionary journey of changing the Trade Finance industry for the better.  Here’s how the China trade with Russia worked step by step, with the successful purchase and delivery of a 3D printer delivery:  1. The seller has a 3D printer to sell:    2. The seller publishes their proposal on the ModulTrade Marketplace — MTP https://product.modultrade.com:    3. The Buyer selects the product and orders the printer.  4. The Buyer and Seller set a smart-contract where funds are deposited via the smart-contract.  5. Seller ships the goods once sees the funds locked by the smart-contract (a courier picks up the goods):    6. The seller changes the status:    7. Smart-contract is tracking goods delivery with help of carrier’s API.  8. The Buyer receives and checks the parcel, and updates the status for the Smart Contract:    9. Upon the goods are delivered Smart-contract releases funds to the Buyer:     Find out more about ModulTrade and our Token Sale at https://en.modultrade.io/  Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: Rigorous
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Even if you average the scores of multiple reviewers, what is the significance of having 2 decimals? First you have to translate the reviewers' opinions into numbers, which is already a very subjective and unscientific practice, then you sum them together, as if every reviewer has the same standards and knowledge, then you divide that sum by the number of reviewers so you get a fractional number, as if those fractions with a precision of one hundredth point are meaningful.  I mean, can you really spot the difference between a team with a score of 3.42 and one of 3.43?

Author: turkandjaydee
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Yes, dont know exactly who is behind it but here is the criteria : Quote -Product: ICO details, features, structure, roadmap, technical explanation, use of token, MVP, use cases, laws & regulations. -Activity: Media activity, site traffic, number of subscribers, smm activity. -Vision: Whitepaper, timeline, current investments, market potential, number of existing user base. -Potential: Risk score and investment potential. -Team: Team rate, verification of all team members. -ICO Profile: Availability of all necessary information for investors.  Rating is not permanent - we are monitoring the ICOs on daily basis. Also we are always improving our rating methodology by adding new criteria in our assessment algorithm.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: A positive look ahead on how and why the value of the ModulTrade token, MTRc, might increase.  ModulTrade https://en.modultrade.io recently launched its ModulTrade Platform https://product.modultrade.com (MTP), a new digital marketplace where micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) can meet, commit and execute trade with freedom. In conjunction, ModulTrade created its own digital token, the MTRc (based on the standard Ethereum) to allow transactions to be made within the eco-system securely and with ease. As we look ahead to the future of the business, we predict and explain how MTRc token owners will be able to increase their assets and why the value of the token might grow. There are three key factors which must work in harmony for a successful asset growth, including:  Network value growth. Number of potential users. Rate of adoption.  Firstly, when we set out our business plan, we thoroughly researched the audience and the market, which in turn calculated a forecast of a significant increase in the value of MTRc, mainly due to the growth of the underlying ModulTrade network made up of MSMEs, third-party service providers and third-party developers. In any case, the network value growth is usually much higher than the growth in the number of its users (Metcalfe’s Law https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metcalfe%27s_law states that a network’s value is proportional to the square of the number of users). Explained in figures, a 2x growth in users could lead to a 4x growth in network value, a 10x to 100x, a 50x to a 2,500x, and so on. Secondly, the next question is how fast can the network grow? The growth in the number of users depends on the potential number of users, then on the adoption rate. In this instance, the potential number of users is huge, with ≈400Mln MSMEs worldwide, plus all the third-party service providers / developers. To give you an idea, this is at least 27x the number of the current Bitcoin Blockchain wallet users (≈15Mln) And thirdly, the adoption rate depends on the following: How useful the ModulTrade Platform is to the potential user (it solves an existing problem by providing MSMEs the chance to trade, while boosting enterprises’ revenues); How long ModulTrade takes to develop the product/platform (ModulTrade have already developed a beta version of the product); How good a business is in acquiring new users (the ModulTrade team are multicultural and multidisciplinary with global reach, and the MTRc token sale is evident of a strong marketing programme). In summary, the approach, potential users and the ModulTrade teams’ efforts to grow a user base, all align towards MTRc having great potential in an increase in value over the coming years, and it is evident that the underlying network does indeed have the potential for a huge and fast growth. ModulTrade is in phase 1 of its main sale, offering a 25% discount until 12 December. To participate and find out more, visit https://en.modultrade.io/ Join us on telegram: https://t.me/ModulTradeIO Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, boys and girls!  It's been emotional since the beginning of this week in this thread!   I would like to thank you all for the support and for challenging the platform either!  As a little recap till date and some hints of the forthcoming events.  1. The platform is doing awesome. It's up and running. We have a good track-record of executed transactions! More interestingly, the trend of new user connections showing North-East.  2.  The ICO sale is great. As we've almost reached the softcap by now.  3. The level of user adoption is in line with our projections. In general, the adoption level is not very high in disruptive technologies by the time of launch. Moreover, as it's rightly pointed out, ModulTrade is among the lower share of ICOs who managed to deliver the operational MVP during the ICO. And probably that makes the industry adopters puzzled.  Of course, we're working a lot to enhance the user experience and make it absolutely handy and native.  So all in all, we're doing well and absolutely happy to deal with the things we're running right now!  Going forward, we're planning to participate in must-be events and will be announcing some great collabs very soon!  So keep watching the news and stay tuned!

Body: A 25% bonus is indeed not that much by current ICO standards, but the effect is the same. You attract early investors and reward them for taking a risk, but you also scare away latecomers. It is too late for a new token sale structure.  You could 'compensate' late investors for missing out on the bonus by lowering risk, for example through partnerships, development, press coverage and attending conferences.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModulTrade’s token sale opens with influx of contributions. You can be one of these pioneers and benefit from the special 25% discount, now  Just 7 days ago ModulTrade opened their main sale, offering people around the world the chance to participate in this revolutionary project, with impressive results. ModulTrade set a soft-cap of 5 million MTRc (the ModulTrade token architected on Ethereum), and at the time of writing, we have reached contributions of 4.8 million MTRc, equal to a nominal value of $2.1 million! Edging ever closer to successfully reaching the soft cap, we are receiving new contributions daily from around the world, with participants benefiting from a 25% discount — this ends on 12 December, so take part now and don’t miss out on this opportunity. ModulTrade are on a mission to democratize global trade through the creation of a new digital marketplace, where micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) can trade with ease and freedom. The team have identified and addressed the needs of MSMEs by building a solution that eliminates the traditional barriers for entry in global trade, such as lack of trust, high entry costs and the complexity of trade-related operations. The platform https://product.modultrade.com/ is built with MSMEs already trading, running on blockchain technology and smart-contracts to provide a safe and secure online platform, where both buyers and sellers from anywhere in the world benefit from lower costs, efficiencies and a successful full trade cycle. To get 25% off now until 12 December, track the progress of the sale, and to find out more about ModulTrade, visit https://en.modultrade.io/ Join us on https://t.me/ModulTradeIO Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade for latest news and developments.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, everybody!  As I can understand from randomly scrolling the last several pages, many of you just wonder, if ModulTrade has a live platform or it's a demo.  So to make sure that all of you are on the same page, let me announce it once again.  ModulTrade platform is up and running! You very much welcome and try it yourself. The deals are real and the transactions are settled as declared.  We already have a fair trail of transactions executed within European counterparties and China - Europe flow too!  Come and join us! Feel free to refer product.modultrade.com to your friends!  To make it handy we provided necessary operation guides there.  For any suggestions and feedbacks you approach us here and thru our telegram https://t.me/ModulTradeIO   Stay tuned and have a great week!

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, everybody!  As you probably know, ModulTrade participated in BlockShow Asia conference in Singapore.  Here find the news updated from the conference.  Earlier this week, ModulTrade CEO and Co-founder, Evgeny Kaplin, took to the stage at the BlockShow Asia conference in Singapore to proudly present the new and fully functioning ModulTrade Platform — a digital marketplace for MSMEs (micro, small and medium enterprises) to trade with ease and freedom. To a packed audience of interested investors, start-ups and developers, Evgeny explained in detail the journey from conception and development, through to the recent launch of the platform by the ModulTrade tech team. The launch of the ModulTrade Platform now means that any MSME from anywhere in the world can confidently trade between markets, trustfully. The announcement was well received, with glowing praise on the adoption of blockchain technology and smart-contracts to minimise costs and increase efficiencies through replicating traditional bank processes, but at a much lower fee and with the bonus of user security and trust. More so, that the team at ModulTrade are shaking up the financial trade industry, opening trade routes wide for MSMEs and have created a new piece of technology that will influence the future of fintech.  Find out more about ModulTrade and our Main Sale at https://en.modultrade.io/  Join our loyal community at Telegram  Follow us on Facebook and Twitter for latest news and developments.

Author: harryb
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: I’ve been following this project for a while. I start thinking the MTRc can grow a lot in the next years, ‘cause the network has a huge potential: • The token value depends on network growth; basically, the MTRc is like a token to access the underlying network (made up of enterprises, third-party service providers and third-party developers). The greater the network value, the greater the MTRc value • Network value growth is much higher than the growth in the number of its users (proportional to the square of the number of users; in figures, a 2x growth in users could lead to a 4x growth in network value, a 10x to 100x, a 50x to a 2,500x and so on) • Growth in the number of users depends on its potential and on the adoption rate, and they both look big • The potential number of users is huge (≈400Mln enterprises plus all the third party service providers / developers vs ≈15Mln Bitcoin wallet users, for example) • The adoption rate can be big as it depends on the incentive to use the platform, on how long it takes to develop it and on how good they will in acquiring new users  Enterprises are incentivized to use the platform ‘cause it solves a real problem and it can really boost their revenues. The product is already available in beta so platform development is not supposed to take long. The team is very good: multicultural, multidisciplinary and they’re showing great marketing skills in the MTRc campaign so far.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: The ModulTrade team is pleased to share the news that Philippe Taillet, Senior Vice President Service Operations Pan Europe, Sodexo, has joined our advisory board. Philippe first joined Sodexo, the French food services and facilities management company, in 1995, as Vice President Corporate Strategy in Paris, France. In April 1998, when Sodexo USA and Marriott Management Services merged to form Sodexho Marriott Services, Philippe was appointed Senior Vice President, Strategic Planning of the new NYSE listed company. In July of 2000, Philippe became Chief Information Officer of Sodexo North America, and from October 2004 to December 2015 he was Group Chief Information Officer of Sodexo. Before Sodexo, Philippe joined Disney in France, where he built the technical maintenance organization for the 1992 Disneyland Paris Theme Park Grand Opening, which he led until June of 1995 as Director Facilities Maintenance. Earlier in his career Philippe worked as an electrical engineer and software developer for Schlumberger Oil Field Services in Paris and as a management consultant for Bain & Company in Paris and Boston. Philippe is a graduate of Ecole Polytechnique, France and holds an MBA with Distinctions from Harvard Business School. We are looking forward to working with Philippe as we continue to democratize global trade for micro, small and medium enterprises. Visit https://modultrade.io to find out more about ModulTrade, our team and advisory board. Did you know our global trade platform is now live and ready to use? You can start trading with freedom now. Visit https://product.modultrade.com/ to register today.  Our Facebook https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/  Our Telegram https://t.me/ModulTradeIO  Our Twitter https://twitter.com/ModulTrade

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, everybody! Are you running a micro, small or medium enterprise? Frustrated with not having the same opportunities as larger companies? Looking to expand your global footprint? Struggle no more, as ModulTrade has now officially LAUNCHED its global digital trade platform (MTP).  Please visit https://product.modultrade.com/ and start to trade around the world, trustfully and at minimal costs.  From today, every business operator, no matter their company size, location or service, can meet, commit and execute trade on our fully functioning blockchain based platform. Through very simple steps, whether you’re a buyer, seller, or both, you can easily register and update your profile, add a shipping and pick-up address, and use ETH wallet with a ModulTrade account to make your secure and trusted transactions. Our application of smart-contracts means funds are locked right up until products are received, so you don’t have to worry about paying for goods before you see them. We integrated DHL (other logistic companies will be added soon) so you can track the progress of your delivery in real-time, on the MTP.  If you want to sell a product, all you need to do is follow these simple steps to trade with freedom: 1. Create your proposal to sell your product 2. Select your method and terms of payment 3. Select your delivery terms and logistics company 4. Publish your proposal — a link will be created which you can share on other channels. Upload high-res images to best market your product. 5. Receive confirmation from MTP when the buyer has sent funds to a smart-contract 6. Ship your product and send tracking number to smart-contract — use our integrated DHL service to track progress in real time 7. Receive payment — as soon as the product is delivered, funds will be automatically released to your wallet  And, if you’re a trusted buyer… 1.Select a proposal you want to buy 2. Confirm your details to ignite the smart-contract 3. Confirm the trade by sending money to the address of the smart-contract (seller will ship your product once they are notified that funds are on the smart-contract) 4. Track the delivery of your product in real-time 5. Receive your goods 6. The payable amount is automatically transferred to the seller.  To allow entrepreneurs to test the ModulTrade Platform, some MTRc has been released for free float in the system. Users may buy and sell MTRc at a nominal price of 1ETH = 700MTRc at the exchange, Etherdelta.com. And you can buy MTRc with 30% discount at ModulTrade Token Distribution at https://en.modultrade.io/  Soon, the ModulTrade platform will buy MTRc at a nominal rate for fiat from merchants. Currently, both sellers and buyers may choose between MTRc or ETH payment token, with plans to soon accept other ERC20 tokens, along with fiat (USD, EU, £ etc.).  A unique one-stop digital hub, the ModulTrade platform will change the way you trade, open networks across the globe, and provide a platform which will ultimately save you time and money. So, join us now and be a part of democratizing global trade by visiting the ModulTrade platform today to buy and sell goods with MTRc and ETH.  What are you waiting for? The ModulTrade Team. Enjoy the freedom to trade!  Join pre-sale and get 30% discount! https://en.modultrade.io/  Join the discussion on telegram: t.me/modultradeIO  Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/  BitcoinTalk: www.bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2240518.0

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, everybody! We’ve got amazing news!  It’s a great day today for ModulTrade and our platform, which brings opportunity to one of the largest communities in the world - micro, small and medium businesses.  We’re in live production starting from today! Now, users can easily register and update their profiles, add shipping and pick-up address, and use ETH wallet with an MT account.  Also, the platform provides necessary comfort functionality like automatic refunds in the case of contract cancellation or non-delivery and logistic service integration where everyone can track delivery status.  In order to enhance your experience on the platform, we improved the way you can execute trade and manage your proposal by uploading hi-res pictures of your product.  Finally, to make it truly handy, we’ve integrated API from DHL to support European markets and to support the east, we have partnered with Delovie Linii.  Following months of planning, testing and development, we’re very proud to present you our solid MT platform, live and ready to trade, with many advanced features.  We’re glad to see you joining us and supporting the growth of the community.  Welcome at product.modultrade.com

Author: felix007kr
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, Modultrade team!  I've familiarized with various trading platforms like yours (for example Storiqa) and unfortunately they have a common problem with accepting payments in ETH. Would you introduce other possibilities apart from ETH? Of course it's hard to say which cryptocurrency is stable right now, perhaps USDT? Actually it's kinda odd situation when ETH's rate keeps fluctuating and the product's price cannot be guaranteed! Thus, microenterprises and customers would face with exchange rate risk by concluding long-term contracts.  You shed the light on the problem of using banks as middlemen in running business. However, the problem is more complex while famous retail groups charge an extremely high markups and annual rebates. I’m not even talking about fines and mutual claims to each other. Even if deduct banks and retail groups from this vicious circle we face with the expediency in expanding the number of third-party logistics companies that are capable of managing heavy&large item deliveries! This information could be used in your presentation.  Nevertheless, I see that the project looks promising. Hope that with the help of crypto community and concerned people you would be able to find effective solutions answering these calls by using the blockchain technology!  All the best, felix007kr

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, felix007kr. Crossborder trade is all about currency exchange rate fluctuation if the parties deal with different currencies irrespective of fiat or crypto. In the world of fiat, the Indian counterparty that buys from the Polish manufacturer has to take care of the INR vs. Euro or Zloty currency risk while committing the contract. Likewise, the Polish has to offset the exchange risk when the account is credited with export proceeds. So both parties either put currency exchange clause into the contract to minimize the above-mentioned risk or apply for trade-related service - the hedge. Moving forward, trade-related services are very much considered and shall be gradually enabled.  Thank you for emphasizing on this topic!

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hey, hey. Hello, adiksau0414. Thank you for challenging this one out. ModulTrade will replace inefficient banking brick and mortar model of today with the highly adequate and super efficient smart-contract that will definitely play out as a surrogate for a standard letter of credit but way far cheaper than it's right now. As far complexity goes, we introduce 3rd party providers who will submit service proposals on the platform. So the counterparties will have the freedom to choose, subscribe and get what they're really paying for. This is what ModulTrade is about. We combine the experience with highly advanced expertise and the Advisory board of industry leaders.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, bamb. As the business model suggests, we democratize international trade for SME business dealing in B2B worldwide. Thus, all types of traded goods can be found and purchased. As far as business needs always go beyond simple requirements, we develop an open platform giving the freedom to all trade related 3rd party service providers to participate and create additional value for the clients. Concerning the fees, there's one fee set - transaction fee. No any other hidden charges or expenditures.  So stay tuned and look for more news to come soon!

Author: CryptosapienZA
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: The beauty of the blockchain is that there are no funds that will be going to Modul Trade. Traders using the platform will facilitate their transactions using smart contracts. The buyer and seller will set a Smart-contract. Then the buyer will deposit funds with the Smart-contract Once that is completed, the seller will ship the goods and  the funds will be locked by the smart-contract. The Smart-contract will be responsible for tracking the delivery of goods. Upon the delivery, the Smart-contract releases funds to the Buyer.

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, everybody. We've got great news for you this evening. The team at ModulTrade is growing, and we’re delighted to share that Alexei Katrich, has joined us as co-founder.  Alexei is a consultant in FinTech, InsurTech and Blockchain, and has over 20 years of professional IT and banking experience, with a deep and excellent knowledge in banking transformation, product development and information security.  During his career, Alexei has held executive roles at IBM, UNISYS, ING, Intesa Sanpaolo, Deutsche Bank and Sberbank.  From all at ModulTrade, we are pleased with this new exciting step in our project and to have Alexei be a part of our team. We all look forward to working with him.  For those who joined us recently, you may follow us at - https://medium.com/@ModulTrade - modultrade.io - https://www.facebook.com/modultrade/?ref=br_rs  I would like to invite you all to wish him the best of luck and the great success!

Author: VitalyP
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, llhibionada. Actually, the return of the item isn't an independent transaction but a part of the product sale cycle. Hence, if the item is returned due to a particular reason: non-satisfactory condition or not in line with the contract specification, it's handled under the same smart-contract. And it's going to be treated by smart-contract as non-delivery. Finally, the smart-contract will end up as canceled without any crypto transfer to the seller. Thus, the smart-contract helps to avoid any mess and secure the purchase for both parties (the seller and the buyer).  Thank you for being with us and keep watching!

Author: VitalyP
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, everybody in this thread!  Scrolling through the pages, I found one interesting question and decided to spend some time on it. - So how can the buyer benefit from dealing with MT platform apart from regular sales and purchase transactions?  And here're the advantages that I wanted to zoom on to make it handy.  Definitely, the buyer shall benefit from lower expenses with MT while compared to the bank's charges that might be as much as 15% of transaction volume in different cases. And here I even take the time spent out the equation. The buyer may also choose among a wide range of merchants offers. And the transportation charges can be minimized on the top of it while MT provides the option. Not least, MT platform will provide a selection of various trade-related consultancy services, such as taxation, customs, market research, inspection.  Hence, MT will create a user-friendly ecosystem combined with cutting-edge blockchain technology!  So let's wish the best of luck to the hardworking project team and everyone who is participating the pre-ICO and will join the ICO sale at the later stage!  Stay tuned!

Author: Evgeny Kaplin
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hi! thank you for this comment! in this one-pager, we summarized of what ModulTrade is and what is MTRc https://modultrade.io/Pre-sale%20One%20Pager.pdf  In short, ModulTrade is an application for small business which gives them access to global trade - Marketplaces - Secure instrument for payment and delivery of goods, - end-to-end trade-related services - logistics, insurance,  tax, etc - financing in MTRc to start buying on ModulTrade platform  MTRc is the key to ModulTrade platform - every trade executed requires the fee in MTRc - you can pay for goods in MTRc - you can get credit in MTRc to buy  MTRc holders will be able to finance trade on ModulTrade platform - P2B trade financing - give MTRc to ModulTrade users for a fee based on the Reputational Capital  happy to answer in details

Author: viljy
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: The seller and so will have a payment from the buyer instantly, without any crypto currency. Through the bank, even faster than the blocks of ETH are confirmed. In the case of payments through the bank, the buyer can appeal the payment and return the money. But in case of payment by crypto currency, you can not return anything and you can stay without money and without goods. On the other hand, there are cases of fraud of buyers who waited for 3 days of sending the goods, and canceled the payment. And then, if the seller did not have time to withdraw money, he remained without goods and without money. It flourished on one marketplace with all sorts of old junk. Especially women were fond of it. They there at a forum directly discussed how to do it, exchanged experience. They ran to the bank, they wrote a statement, shed tears and paid back, but this is only if the seller is careless.

Author: Mystic90
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Did u guys see this blog on medium?  "The first objective had to land with users, otherwise why switch from using the current offering from banks? The ModulTrade platform takes the seller and buyer through a series of easy to follow steps which replicates banks’ letter of credit without a bank: - The seller creates a proposal in the system. - The proposal is sent through to the marketplace where potential, qualified buyers can see it. - A buyer checks the product and agrees to buy. - Thereafter, both parties can watch and match the despatch of goods to the release of funds."   https://medium.com/@ModulTrade/explaining-modultrades-minimum-viable-product-the-platform-1a888e3a4d91

Author: viljy
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: You describe the situation of the buyer to me, and I describe the situation of the seller to you. If the seller sells for a crypto currency, this is not a sale, but a barter exchange. Since it is impossible to calculate profit. Since the crypto currency is not recognized as legal money, by property or securities. That's when they recognize the crypto currency, then there will be taxation. And the fact that the buyer pays a customs duty even for a gift is not news.

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: ModuleTrade is different :)  I. ModulTrade monetizes the need of 400mln SMEs to start trade globally 1. ModulTrade is starting to use blockchain for the real B2B trade (small Constructor from Italy buys paints from Poland) 2. ModulTrade replicates bank instruments on blockchain (Letter of Credit and Guarantee) at almost zero costs, vs.5-15% charged by banks (SMEs gets secure mechanism for payment and delivery) 3. ModulTrade solves all SMEs trade-related hassles (ModulTrade and 3rd party provides financing, payments, logistics, insurance, etc )  II. Working Prototype is on https://modultrade.com/  III. ModulTrade team is experienced in Trade Finance and Technology and supported by world industry leaders like Bernard Lietaer   What do you think?

Body: Hi, Mystic90. As far as marketplace integration goes, surely we will connect them according to our internal verification process to minimize counterparty risk. Marketplace won't need to run any code themselves while MT gives a compatible interface for connection. However, we make necessary reservations for specific connectivity cases. As regards to the currency, you may check out our testing prototype at modultrade.io. It proposes a selection of currencies. Hope that clarifies  Bests!

Author: VitalyP
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, matjas. Thank you for asking this one out here. To mitigate the currency volatility risk ModulTrade offers several options: 1. Payments in fiat currencies USD/EUR. 2. MTRc stable exchange rate. MTRc will be linked to volume of trades executed on ModulTrade platform and not to FX markets. The above two will be available from Day 1.  3. And we work on the solution like FX forwards and options to cover FX risks. That's going to be added on the go.

Due to the banks' size, they are naturally 'wasteful' with lots of overheads (eg. overpaid management staff, physical office costs, utilities, etc).

Author: JeanC
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀

Author: Evgeny Kaplin
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hi!  In the core of ModulTrdae solution is the smart-contract platform which replicates banks' Trade Finance instrument - Letter of Credit at almost zero costs vs. 5-15% charged by banks  On top of it ModulTrade provides end to end service for B2B trade cycle - Marketplaces where SMEs can meet each other - Trade & Reputational Network where SMEs can get funding from ModulTrade or MTRc token holders to start buying - Platform for 3rd party trade-related services (logistics, insurance, tax, etc.). So SMEs can execute the trade with ease  and there is much more to offer, for example, solutions based on the Big Data ModulTrade will collect from the SMEs trade statistic

Author: JeanC
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Dear Sozialtourist, We see banks transposing their trade finance (in the domain of Letter of Credit) beginning to think about launching those services on  blockchain, but for their clients. Not easy for them giving their size and regulatory constraints... We think that the odds are excellent for Modultrade to offer an alternative for SMEs that cannot access this space through traditional banks (400+ Mlns SMEs). if you want to take the bet with us, you're most welcome! Join our ICO!  Best, Jean https://t.me/ModulTradeIO

Author: JeanC
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Great question guys! on tax front, depending on the destination and origin of goods, trade parties can optimize their taxes (especially withholding taxes, related to international trade) , related to the deal. in big organizations, this tax optimzation is taken care of by tax departments, internal to these organizations. Small and Medium businesses cannot afford the cost of such departments. Again, Modultrade will offer, through its ecosystem, a service related to tax optimzation, that can be mutualized by all participants (and reduce costs by the same token   Jean

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: True. In general trade's best practices, the seller includes insurance on the goods (through the logistics) in his price. However, ... Modultrade is an open Platform. Remember?  in the Meet, Commit and Execute chain, all ecosystem is involved. Including our insurance, and logistics partners who will propose their services on the Platform, making it a One Stop Shop for SMEs, who can take advantage of the network effect to benefit from optimized prices. and of the reputational network mechanisms to have a good service from a good Partner. a Win/Win situation for all.

Author: VitalyP
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, boys and girls. As a practice, transportation charges and insurance are born by the seller who arranges the delivery. Hence insurance fee is payable by the seller. ModulTrade ecosystem encompasses trade-related services and will provide multiple options for insurance, inspection, delivery and etc. Therefore, should the buyer have any discomfort in terms of insurance, he may always request to consider his/her choice. And that has to be decided between the parties. And of course, Insurance charges can use MT tokens to pay for the insurance.  Stay tuned for more news and have a great day ahead!

Author: karkal
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀

Doing Implementation country by country helps us produce better network effect as well as provide those additional services that are required to complete the trade.

Author: karkal
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Pre-ICO with 40% discount is currently running. Please refer https://modultrade.io/ for further details.

Author: karkal
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: I believe all trades whether it is B2C , B2B, B2T etc will be smart contract enabled in the near future. Today B2C is run by centralized organizations under their rules and one dimensional and customers have no choice. B2B trade is done by a contract negotiated over a longer period of time with a lot of cost involved. EXIM trade has more complications with big banks playing as guarantors. In future IOT will transform how trade is being conducted between businesses , machines and customers. Evolution of Smart contract along with the underlying blockchain technology will provide a mechanism to effectively handle the nuances of each of these type of trades in the near future.  MT offers end-end platform including taxation, logistics etc apart from the escrow capability as part of the smart contract.

Author: Rigorous
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀

So ModulTrade is trying to replace Alibaba, Alipay and AliExpress by making them decentralized, blockchain-based and bound by smart contracts. That is a lofty goal but it is going to be an uphill battle trying to dethrone the biggest companies in the world.

Author: karkal
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: What I'm saying is future of trade is smart contract enabled, not necessarily by MT alone. Currently we are busy trying to solve the most complex trade(EXIM). For now, our objective is enabling small businesses to do global trade effectively and efficiently.

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: I looked for some answers on the website of Modultrade, if you look at the following simple explanation of smart contract trading, you would think the trade cant go wrong.  STAGE I Buyer and Seller set a Smart-contract Buyer deposits funds with the Smart-contract STAGE II Seller ships goods once sees the funds locked by the smart-contract Smart-contract is tracking goods delivery STAGE III Upon the goods are delivered Smart-contract releases funds to the Buyer  But yeah, what if during transport the product is damaged, then there must be some kind of insurance involved

Author: VitalyP
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, T-Gee05. Irrespective of payment terms, naturally, the risks of loss, damage and theft may occur and covered by adequate insurance which is usually arranged by the seller. Hence any trade proposes insurance where goods delivery is involved. MT will connect 3rd party service providers such as logistics, insurance, inspection etc. to enhance customer experience and insure the value proposition. The cases of wrongdoing or non-delivery will trigger a smart-contract and the payment as well. No goods - no money!  No doubt, MTP will conduct verification of trading parties in order to ensure the greatest customer experience and minimise counterparty risk. As far as the buying party is concerned, the smart-contract allows to trigger the payment and release without the seller's authorisation once it's signed. Hope that clarifies.  Stay tuned!

Author: ModulTrade
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, harryb. As we are working for a revolutionary, decentralized project, we are doing that in a revolutionary, decentralized way. The team is distributed on the two sides of the Ocean, in a way that top professionals can collaborate remotely, in a decentralized way, with freedom and flexibility, putting together their diverse cultures and professional backgrounds, united by a common goal: democratizing global trade. In fact our internal ecosystem is designed for speed, agility, and adaptability, based on integration of physical and virtual environments. This, in turn creates a self-reinforcing cycle as talent creates more opportunities for growth and allows us to move faster, adapt more quickly, learn more rapidly, and embrace dynamic career demands.

Author: Evgeny Kaplin
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello!  Thank you for the nice comment!   Indeed ModulTrade team is building a solution which helps us - people in the real world to trade with Blockchain technology.  Our WHY is "Give the Freedom to Trade"  Allow small enterprises to become equal partners in the global trade.  Thank you for being with us and your support!

Author: Evgeny Kaplin
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hi!  You can check our Roadmap at https://modultrade.com/ And more details in White paper.  Our go to Market strategy is 1. to enable existing Marketplaces with ModulTrade functionality. Thus MT will onboard existing customers of Marketplaces.  We will do a pilot with our supporter - German Marketplace https://www.contorion.de/ 2. to provide credit in MTRc to small enterprises so they will be able to start buying on the ModulTrade platform. more on that in Trade&Reputational Network concept in WP MTRc holders will be able to finance trade transactions based on users Reputational Capital

Author: Evgeny Kaplin
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello! you are right - ModulTrade offers bank's instruments for B2B trade service (Letter of credit, Guarantee) without a bank and its high charges

The smart contract will manage/track the whole progress including the payment after the trade is completed for everyone's satisfaction.

Author: VitalyP
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, Sozialtourist. Let me clarify this point. The party may pay as much as 15% of the transaction value while dealing with the bank in order to receive trade finance product such as LC (letter of credit) or BG (bank guarantee). No doubt the charges may vary from country to country and very much dependent on conditions of financing. Hence, 15% compared to ModulTrade transaction fee which is capped at 1% of transaction value. Hope this clarifies enough. The parties transact in crypto in MTP. And you are right, a bank account is used as an escrow account for fiat.

Author: Trrrt
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀

Author: VitalyP
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello, T-Gee05. the use of smart-contract proposes that business process will be inevitably T+0 vs. regular trade finance cycle that may start from T+1 upto no limit. As compared to regular banking approach, banking fees and commissions may go beyond 10% upto 15%. However, MTP charges flat 1% from transaction volume. Hope it will suffice!

Author: karkal
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Yes, ubercool, trading all over the world is the ultimate aim of ModulTrade. Regarding escrow - the smart contract itself will hold the funds in escrow for the duration of a trade thus simultaneously being an escrow agent and a guarantor of trust. However, since some of the counterparties will prefer using e.g. fiat currencies in their transactions anyway, MTRc will play a role of an intermediary denomination token for trade, while there will be a usability option to automatically exchange MTRc to the currency of choice (including fiats). To allow this, ModulTrade will rely on its partners and external crypto exchanges.

Author: harryb
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hi - My understanding is that there's going to be an escrow handled by the smart contracts. Basically, according to the white paper: 1) The Buyer deposits funds into the smart contract which acts as an escrow agent. 2) Funds are locked in the smart contract until release conditions are met. 3) Funds are released to the Seller upon successful delivery in a specified time horizon. 4) Funds are released to the Buyer if no delivery occurs in a specified time horizon.  HTH

Author: Evgeny Kaplin
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hello everyone! Thank you for your comments and support as well as for challenging us)  Let me share some thoughts on MTRc value (ModulTrade token) https://modultrade.io/  1.Every trade executed by SMEs on ModulTrade platform requires MTRc - to pay commission in all cases (for Smart-contracts or additional services) - to pay for goods in case the trade contract is set in MTRc  2. Most SMEs require money to start buying (more info here https://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/financialsector/brief/smes-finance) - To help SMEs ModulTrade and MTRc holders will provide MTRc to SMEs based on their Reputational Capital - ModulTrade introduces Trade&Reputational Network -  for every user Limit in MTRc and related fee will be calculated (Reputational Capital) and will be changed based on user trade behaviour.  3. Merchants are waiting for SMEs to start buying - ModulTrade will agree with Merchants to accept MTRc for the goods (we are planning a pilot with our German partner https://www.contorion.de/) - and ModulTrade will buy back MTRc from Merchants they got from SMEs (for fiat or cryptocurrency) - and ModulTrade will provide MTRc to SMEs - see point 2 above.  While there is a limited number of MTRc distributed (~$5-15mln equivalent), Every next $10mln trades served on ModulTrade will require equivalent of $2-3mln in MTRc (or up to $5-7mln in case of wide MTRc acceptance) simple mathematics will give >50% value increase for every new $10mln trades ( or 2-3 in case of wide MTRc acceptance)  We expect >$50 mln to be served by end of 2019 . and you may calculate the value of MTRc in this case ($50/$10*(0.5 or 3)) = 2.5-15 times . It is not a promise but what we expect  will be happy to answer your questions

Author: karkal
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Current demographics explosion in emerging countries, and economic recession in developed ones introduce challenges in managing food safety either on collective environment (corporate restaurants, schoolcanteens) or on public levels.  In collective environments, companies involved in catering spend a significant part of their revenues on food safety and food chain tracking, to remain compliant with food safety regulations. For major catering companies (Aramark, Sodexo, Compass), this represents circa 4 Bn US $ per year.  MT will represent the marketplace where food safety players meet, commit on the rules and automatically execute their commitments with an enhanced trusted environment (MT) and rewarding mechanisms (MTRc).

Author: XIANJ
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Thank you Karthik! great project addressing real pain! huge biz opportunities for us. a no-brainer!

Author: JeanC
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Guys and Girls!  I am Jean. Cofounder and COO of Modultrade.  Allow me to share my vision with you: why I invested (and still investing) in this startup. it will, probably summarize the spirit of our White Paper.  We are, I believe at the dawn of a new world. It is not us, at Modultrade, who say so. It is organizations like HSBC . Look at their publicity about the new commerce players: Micro and Small Businesses. How do you think, these players, will address the markets? alone? with HSBC?  So here is our vision, put in simple words:  1.Players like Modultrade are the new normality: No bla-bla! We do one thing (trade finance) and we do it right! Why? because we are experts in doing and in transforming it!  2. Means, like MTRc, are the new missing  chain, between the virtual world of e-Commerce, and the real world of the assets traded. No third parties, no overheads, no empty talk! you pay what you get! MTRc is the only key to this immense new world => it will become scarce ... and valuable.  3. Micro and Small Businesses that Modultrade is enroling have valuable products and services. they want to conquer the world easily. Modultrade will be their Gateway, MTRc their key!   4. Ecosystem partners that Modultrade is bringing, have today a real problem in addressing our market : 400+ Mln SMEs. Either they are too big (and they need an intermediary) or too small and they need to scale up. in either case, they need MTRc to access the market.   Guys and girls, if you want to be part of this new world, and if you believe in the value of cryptocurrency, beyond a speculative tool, then do like we did: ENGAGE!

Author: dsmodul
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] 🚀🚀 ModulTrade : The Freedom To Trade 🚀🚀
Body: Hi bapparabi.  Wonderful question. We do not want to restrict our users to a limited set of payment options. The payment methods that you saw in the prototype (ETH, MTRc, Paypal, Credit Card) are there to demonstrate that we would like to support as many types of methods as possible to make it convenient for our users. It is true, that paypal is costly, but it can be a method of choice for certain users (for example in those jurisdictions where cryptocurrency is banned). BTC is also an option and we plan to include it too.  This is also why we introduce MTRc. On one hand, we need a convenient proxy token to use in our processes and transactions; on another hand, it should be independent enough to appreciate in value in direct relation to the growth of the ecosystem. Basically, the bigger the ecosystem is (buyers, sellers, partners, 3rd party service providers, etc.), the more valuable MTRc becomes. Of course, to transact directly in MTRc will be cheapest.
